GP12brndp2_u:3217: yuddhāni dvāpare nityaṃ pākhaṇḍāśca kalau yuge // BndP_2,14.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:3219: śvā caiva hanti śrāddhāni darśanādeva sarvaśaḥ // BndP_2,14.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:3223: utsraṣṭavyāḥ pradhā nārthaiḥ saṃskārastvāpado bhavet // BndP_2,14.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:3225: sṛṣṭaṃ yuktābhiradbhiśca prokṣaṇaṃ ca vidhīyate // BndP_2,14.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:3229: amedhyairjaṅgamairdṛṣṭaṃ śuṣkaṃ paryuṣitaṃ ca yat // BndP_2,14.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:3237: ayajñaya tayo nāma te dhvaṃsaṃti yathā rajaḥ // BndP_2,14.57 //
GP12brndp2_u:3240: saindhavaṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva tathā mānasasaṃbhavam // BndP_2,14.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:3242: agnau prakṣipya gṛṅṇīyāddhastau prakṣipya yatnataḥ // BndP_2,14.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:3244: dravyāṇāṃ prokṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tathaivāvapanaṃ punaḥ // BndP_2,14.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:3245: nidhāya cādbhiḥ siṃcetta ttathā cāsu niveśanam /
GP12brndp2_u:3248: tathā dantāsthi dāruṇāṃ śṛṅgāṇāṃ cāvalekhanam // BndP_2,14.62 //
GP12brndp2_u:3258: niṣeko gokramo dāhaḥ khananaṃ śuddhiriṣyate // BndP_2,14.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:3260: puṃsāṃ catuṣpadāṃ cava mṛdbhiḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // BndP_2,14.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:3264: kuryātpurīṣaṃ hi śiro 'vaguṇṭhya na vai spṛśejjātu śiraḥ kareṇa //
GP12brndp2_u:3266: susaṃvṛtte pradeśe ca ṇantardhāya vasuṃdharām // BndP_2,14.71 //
GP12brndp2_u:3268: divā udaṅmukhaḥ kuryādrātrau vai dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // BndP_2,14.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:3270: śaucaṃ vāmena hastena gude tisrastu mṛttikāḥ // BndP_2,14.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:3272: ubhābhyāṃ vā punardadyāddvābhyāṃ sapta tu mṛttikāḥ // BndP_2,14.74 //
GP12brndp2_u:3273: mṛdā prakṣālya pādau tu ācamya ca yathāvidhi /
GP12brndp2_u:3280: spṛṣṭvā śvānaṃ śvapākaṃ ca taptakṛcchraṃ samācaret // BndP_2,14.78 //
GP12brndp2_u:3284: pītvā cāpobhūtilapā gatvā cāpi yugaṃ dharam // BndP_2,14.80 //
GP12brndp2_u:3288: gacchatāṃ rāgasaṃmohātteṣāṃ pāpaṃ na gacchati // BndP_2,14.82 //
GP12brndp2_u:3290: āruhya bhṛgutuṅgaṃ tu gatvā puṇyāṃ sarasvatīm // BndP_2,14.83 //
GP12brndp2_u:3291: āpagāṃ ca nadīṃ ramyāṃ gaṅgāṃ devīṃ mahānadīm /
GP12brndp2_u:3297: arddhamāsaṃ tu vaiśyasya māsaṃ śūdrasya caiva ha /
GP12brndp2_u:3302: etadeva bhavecchaucaṃ maithune vamane tathā // BndP_2,14.89 //
GP12brndp2_u:3303: mṛdā prakṣālyahastau tu kuryācchaucaṃ ca mānavaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3304: prakṣālya cādbhiḥ snātvā tu hastau caiva punarmṛdā // BndP_2,14.90 //
GP12brndp2_u:3305: triḥ kṛtvā dvādaśāntāni yathā lepastathā bhavet /
GP12brndp2_u:3308: araṇye śaucametattu grāmyaṃ vakṣyāmyataḥ param // BndP_2,14.92 //
GP12brndp2_u:3312: kaṇṭhaṃ śiro vā āvṛtya rathyāpaṇagato 'pi vā // BndP_2,14.94 //
GP12brndp2_u:3314: pakṣālya pātraṃ nikṣipya ācamyābhyukṣaṇaṃ tataḥ // BndP_2,14.95 //
GP12brndp2_u:3316: puṣpādīnāṃ tṛṇānāṃ ca prokṣaṇaṃ haviṣāṃ tathā // BndP_2,14.96 //
GP12brndp2_u:3318: nāprokṣitaṃ spṛśetkiñcicchraddhe daive 'tha vā punaḥ // BndP_2,14.97 //
GP12brndp2_u:3322: dakṣiṇena tu hastena dakṣiṇāṃ vedimālabhet // BndP_2,14.99 //
GP12brndp2_u:3326: ucchiṣṭānāṃ ca saṃsparśe tathā pādāvasecane // BndP_2,14.101 //
GP12brndp2_u:3328: saṃdeheṣu ca sarveṣu śikhāṃ muktvā tathaiva ca // BndP_2,14.102 //
GP12brndp2_u:3331: jihvayā caiva saṃsvṛśya detāsaktaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3334: upaviśya śucau deśe prayataḥ prāgudaṅmukhaḥ // BndP_2,14.105 //
GP12brndp2_u:3335: pādau prakṣālya hastau ca antarjānu tvapaḥ spṛśet /
GP12brndp2_u:3338: khāni mūrddhānamātmānaṃ hastau pādau tathaiva ca // BndP_2,14.107 //
GP12brndp2_u:3342: kriyāṃ yaḥ kurute mohādanāsamyeha nāstikaḥ // BndP_2,14.109 //
GP12brndp2_u:3343: bhavanti hi vṛthā tasya kriyā hyetā na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3348: ato 'nyathā tu yaḥ kuryānmohācchaucasya saṃkaram // BndP_2,14.112 //
GP12brndp2_u:3352: śaucena mokṣaṃ kurvāṇaḥ svargavāsī bhavennaraḥ // BndP_2,14.114 //
GP12brndp2_u:3360: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpe 'śaucavidhirnāma caturdaśo 'dhyoyaḥ // 14//
GP12brndp2_u:3361: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ aho dhanyastvayā sūta śrāddhakalpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3362: śrutā naḥ śrāddhakalpāstu ṛṣibhirye prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_2,15.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:3363: atīva vistaro hyasya viśeṣeṇa tu kīrttitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3364: devāśeṣaṃ mahāprājña ṛṣestasya mataṃ yathā // BndP_2,15.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:3365: sūta uvāca kīrttayiṣyāmi vo viprā ṛṣestasya mataṃ tu yat /
GP12brndp2_u:3366: śrāddhaṃ prati mahābhāgastanme śruṇuta vistarāt // BndP_2,15.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:3370: daive pitrye ca niyataṃ śrūyate vai parīkṣaṇam // BndP_2,15.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3373: avijñātaṃ dvijaṃ śrāddhe na parīkṣeta paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3374: siddhā hi viprarūpeṇa caranti pṛthivīmimām // BndP_2,15.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:3380: vyañjanāni tu vakṣyāmi phalaṃ teṣāṃ tathaiva ca // BndP_2,15.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3381: agniṣṭomaṃ payasā prāpnuyādvai phalaṃ tathokthasya ca pāyasena /
GP12brndp2_u:3382: saṣoḍaśī satraphalaṃ ghṛtena madhvātirātrasya phalaṃ tathaiva //
GP12brndp2_u:3383: tathāpnuyācchraddadhā no naro vai sarvaiḥ kāmairbhojayedyastu viprān /
GP12brndp2_u:3384: sarvārthadaṃ sarvaviprātitheyaṃ phalaṃ ca bhuṅkte sarvamedhasya nityam //
GP12brndp2_u:3386: taṃ vai devā nirasyanti hato yadvatparāvasuḥ // BndP_2,15.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3392: vālakhilyo yatiścaiva vijñeyo hyatithiḥ sadā // BndP_2,15.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:3395: nāvratī na ca saṃkīrṇo nāvidyo nāviśeṣavit /
GP12brndp2_u:3396: na ca saṃtānasaṃbaddho na devī nāgase 'tithiḥ // BndP_2,15.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:3398: tasmai satkṛtya dātavyaṃ yajñamya phalamicchatā // BndP_2,15.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:3399: na vaktavyaṃ sadā vipra kṣudhite nāsti kiñcana /
GP12brndp2_u:3400: tasmai satkṛtya dātavyaṃ sadāpacitireva saḥ // BndP_2,15.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:3402: ekāntaśīlaṃ dhīmantaṃ sadā śrāddheṣu bhojayet // BndP_2,15.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:3403: no dadāmi tamityevaṃ brūyādyo vai durātmavān /
GP12brndp2_u:3404: api jātiśataṃ gatvā na sa mucyeta kilbiṣāt // BndP_2,15.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:3406: niyukto hyani yukto vā paṅktyā harati kilbiṣam // BndP_2,15.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:3414: ya ete pūrvanirddiṣṭāḥ sarve te hyanupūrvaśaḥ // BndP_2,15.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:3422: trināciketastrai vidyo yaśca dharmāndvijaḥ paṭhet // BndP_2,15.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:3424: sarve te pāvanā viprāḥ paṅktīnāṃ samudātdṛtāḥ // BndP_2,15.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:3425: āmantritastu yaḥ śrāddhe yoṣitaṃ sevate dvijaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3428: yatiṃ vā vālakhilyaṃ vā bhojayecchrāddakarmaṇi // BndP_2,15.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:3432: yatīnāṃ tu kṛtā pūjā sākṣādbrahmā tuṃ pūjitaḥ // BndP_2,15.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:3434: catvārastvāśramāḥ pūcyāḥ śrāddhe deve tathaiva ca // BndP_2,15.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:3438: ayatirmokṣavādī ca śrutau tau paṅktidūṣakau // BndP_2,15.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:3440: nindanti ca dvijātibhyaḥ sarve te paṅktidūṣakāḥ // BndP_2,15.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:3442: dhyānaṃ nindanti ye kecitsarve te paṅktidūṣakāḥ // BndP_2,15.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:3446: gāya nānvedavṛttāṃśca havyakavye na bhojayet // BndP_2,15.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:3448: yo 'śnāti saha śūdreṇā sarve te paṅktidūṣaṇāḥ // BndP_2,15.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:3449: vyākarṣaṇaṃ sattvanibarhaṇaṃ ca kṛṣirvaṇijyā paśupālanaṃ ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3456: na viyogāstu vedānāṃ yo niyuṅkte sa pāpakṛt // BndP_2,15.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:3461: vṛttireṣā tu vaiśyasya brāhmaṇasya tu pātakam /
GP12brndp2_u:3463: ubhau tau nārhataḥ śrāddhaṃ putrikāpatireva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3464: vṛthā dārāṃśca yo gacchedyo yajeta vṛthādhvaraiḥ // BndP_2,15.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:3466: striyo raktāntarā yeṣāṃ paradāraparāśca ye // BndP_2,15.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:3469: stenaśca sarvayājī ca sarve te paṅktidūṣakāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3470: yaśca sūkaravadbhuṅkte yaśca pāṇitale dvijaḥ // BndP_2,15.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:3471: na tadaśnanti pitaro yaśca vācyaṃ samaśnute /
GP12brndp2_u:3476: avaśeṣaṃ tu dātavyamannādyaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,15.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:3478: yāvanna śrapitaṃ cānnaṃ yāvatauṣṇyaṃ na muñcati // BndP_2,15.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:3480: dattaṃ pratigraho homo bhojanaṃ balireva ca // BndP_2,15.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:3481: sāṃguṣṭhena tathā pādyaṃ nāsurebhyo yathā bhavet /
GP12brndp2_u:3482: etānyeva ca sarvāṇi dānāni ca viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,15.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:3485: ye tu vṛtte sthitā nityaṃ jñānino dhyāninastathā /
GP12brndp2_u:3488: sarvaṃ yogeśvarairvyāptaṃ trailokyaṃ hi nirantaram // BndP_2,15.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:3490: vyaktāvyaktaṃ vaśe kṛtvā sarvasyāpi ca yatparam // BndP_2,15.65 //
GP12brndp2_u:3491: satyāsatyaṃ ca yaddṛṣṭaṃ sada sacca mahātmabhiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3493: tasmātteṣāṃ sadā bhaktaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti vottamam // BndP_2,15.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:3494: ṛcaśca yo veda sa veda vedānyajūṃṣi yo veda yajñam /
GP12brndp2_u:3495: sāmāni yo veda sa veda brahma yo mānasaṃ veda sa veda sarvam //
GP12brndp2_u:3496: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpe brāhmaṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ // 15//
GP12brndp2_u:3497: bṛhaspatiruvāca ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dānāni ca phalāni ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3504: āyuḥ prākāśyamaiśvaryaṃ rūpaṃ ca labhate śubham // BndP_2,16.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:3506: pāvanaṃ sarva viprāṇāṃ brahmadānasya tatphalam // BndP_2,16.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3510: dhenuṃ salabhate divyāṃ payodāṃ sukhado hinīm // BndP_2,16.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:3512: śobhanaṃ labhate yānaṃ pādayoḥ sukhamedhate // BndP_2,16.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:3513: vyacanaṃ tālavṛntaṃ ca dattvā viprāya satkṛtam /
GP12brndp2_u:3515: śrāddhe hyupānahau dattvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sadā budhaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3516: divyaṃ sa labhate yānaṃ vājiyuktaṃ navaṃ tathā // BndP_2,16.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3517: śrāddhe chatraṃ tu yo dadyātpuṣpamālānvitaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp2_u:3520: śrāddhe dattvā yatibhyastu nākapṛṣṭhe mahīyate // BndP_2,16.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3522: vāhanāni ca divyāni prayutānyarbudāni ca // BndP_2,16.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3526: vasetsa tu vimānāgre stūyamānaḥ samantataḥ // BndP_2,16.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:3528: suślakṣmāni suvarṇāni śrāddhe pātrāṇi dāpayet // BndP_2,16.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:3531: mitrāṇi labhate loke strīṣu saubhāgyameva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3532: yaḥ pātraṃ taijasaṃ dadyānmanojña śrāddhabhojanaiḥ // BndP_2,16.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:3533: pātraṃ bhavati kāmānā rūpasya ca dhanasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3534: rājataṃ kāñcanaṃ vāpi yo dadyācchrāddhakarmaṇi // BndP_2,16.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:3536: dhenuṃ śrāddhe tu yo dadyādgṛṣṭiṃ kumbhāpadohanīm // BndP_2,16.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:3538: dadyādyaḥ śiśire cāgniṃ bahukāṣṭhaṃ prayatnataḥ // BndP_2,16.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:3540: indhanāni tu yo dadyā ddvijebhyaḥ śiśirāgame // BndP_2,16.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:3541: nityaṃ jayati saṃgrāme śriyā juṣṭastu jāyate /
GP12brndp2_u:3542: surabhīṇi ca mālyāni gandhavanti tathaiva ca // BndP_2,16.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:3543: pūjayitvā tu pātrebhyaḥ śrāddhe satkṛtya dāpayet /
GP12brndp2_u:3544: gandhamālyaṃ mahātmānaṃ sukhāni vividhāni ca // BndP_2,16.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:3548: śrāddhakāle guṇavati vipre vai samupasthite // BndP_2,16.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:3549: iṣṭadravyaṃ ca yo dadyātsmṛtiṃ medhāṃ ca vindati /
GP12brndp2_u:3550: sarpiḥpūrṇāni pātrāṇi śrāddhe satkṛtya dāpayet // BndP_2,16.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:3552: śrāddhe yathepsitaṃ dattvā puṇḍarīkaphalaṃ labhet // BndP_2,16.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:3558: asmiṃlloke ca saṃpannaṃ syandanaṃ ca suvāhanaiḥ // BndP_2,16.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:3564: bahubhāryāḥ surūpāśca putrā bhṛtyāśca kiṅkarāḥ // BndP_2,16.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:3566: kauśeyaṃ kṣaumakārpāsaṃ dukūlaṃ gahanaṃ tathā // BndP_2,16.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:3568: alakṣmīṃ nāśayantyete tamaḥ sūryodayo yathā // BndP_2,16.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:3572: tasmādvastrāṇi deyāni śrāddhakāle tu nityaśaḥ // BndP_2,16.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:3573: tāni sarvāṇyavāpnoti śrāddhe dattvā tu mānavaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3578: kṛsara madhusarpiśca payaḥ pāyasameva ca // BndP_2,16.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:3581: dattvā na śocate śrāddhe varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3590: śrāddheṣvetāni yo dadyātpadmaṃ sa labhate nidhim // BndP_2,16.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:3592: sarvabhogānavāpnoti pūjyate ca divaṃ gataḥ // BndP_2,16.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:3597: savyañjanaṃ tathā snigdhaṃ bhaktyā satkṛtya yatnataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3604: annaṃ prajāpatiḥ sākṣātte na sarvamidaṃ tatam // BndP_2,16.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:3605: tasmādannasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:3606: yāni ratnāni medinyāṃ vāhanāni striyastathā // BndP_2,16.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:3607: kṣipraṃ prāpnoti tatsarvaṃ pitṛbhaktastu yo naraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3608: pratiśrayaṃ ca yo dadyādatithibyaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ // BndP_2,16.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:3612: dānāni paramo dharmaḥ sadbhiḥ satkṛtya pūjitaḥ // BndP_2,16.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:3613: trailokyasyā dhipatyaṃ hi dānenaiva dhruvaṃ sthitam /
GP12brndp2_u:3615: kṣīṇāyurlabhate cāyuḥ pitṛbhaktaḥ sadā naraḥ // BndP_2,16.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:3616: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpe dānapraśaṃsā nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ // 16//
GP12brndp2_u:3617: bṛhaspatiruvāca ata ūrddhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi śrāddhakarmaṇi pūjitam /
GP12brndp2_u:3622: ādyāpūpaiḥ sadākāryā māṃsairanyā sadā bhavet // BndP_2,17.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:3623: śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syādevaṃ dravyagato vidhiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3624: atrāpīṣṭaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vai nityameva vidhīyate // BndP_2,17.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:3625: yā cāpyanyā caturthī syāttāṃ ca kuryādviśeṣataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3626: āsu śrāddhaṃ budhaḥ kurvansarvasvenāpi nityaśaḥ // BndP_2,17.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3627: kṣipramāpnoti hi śreyaḥ paratreha ca modate /
GP12brndp2_u:3634: puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ smṛtiṃ medhāṃ putrānaiśvaryameva ca // BndP_2,17.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:3635: kurvāṇaḥ pūjanaṃ cāsu sarvaṃ pūrṇaṃ samaśnute /
GP12brndp2_u:3636: pratipaddhanalābhāya labdhaṃ cāsya na naśyati // BndP_2,17.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3638: varārthināṃ tṛtīyā tu śatrughnī pāpanāśinī // BndP_2,17.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3640: pañcamyāṃ cāpikurvāṇaḥ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam // BndP_2,17.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3642: kurute yastu saptamyāṃ śrāddhāni satataṃ naraḥ // BndP_2,17.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3646: kurvandaśamyāṃ tu naro brāhmīṃ śriyamavāpnuyāt // BndP_2,17.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:3648: ekādaśyāṃ paraṃ dānamaiśvarya satataṃ tathā // BndP_2,17.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:3652: yuvānaśca gṛhe yasya mṛtāstebhyaḥ pradāpayet // BndP_2,17.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:3653: śastreṇa vā hatā ye ca teṣāṃ dadyāccaturdaśīm /
GP12brndp2_u:3654: amāvāsyāṃ prayatnena śrāddhaṃ kuryātsadā śuciḥ // BndP_2,17.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:3661: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpe tithiśrāddhavarṇanaṃ nāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ // 17//
GP12brndp2_u:3662: bṛhaspatiruvāca yamastu yāni śrāddhāni provāca śaśabindave /
GP12brndp2_u:3663: tāni me śṛṇu kāryāṇi nakṣatreṣu pṛthak pṛthak // BndP_2,18.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:3664: śrāddhaṃ yaḥ kṛttikāyogaṃ kurute satataṃ naraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3665: agnīnādhāya sa svarge rājate sudṛḍhavrataḥ // BndP_2,18.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:3669: puṣṭikāmaḥ punastiṣye śrāddhaṃ kurvīta mānavaḥ // BndP_2,18.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:3671: jātīnāṃ bhavati śreṣṭho maghāsu śrāddhamācaran // BndP_2,18.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3673: pradānaśīlaḥ sāpatya uttarāsu karoti yaḥ // BndP_2,18.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:3675: citrāyāṃ caiva yaḥ kuryātpaśyedrūpavataḥ sutān // BndP_2,18.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:3677: putrārthī tu viśākhāsu śrāddhamīheta mālavaḥ // BndP_2,18.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:3679: ādhipatyaṃ bhavecchreṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ satataṃ tu yaḥ // BndP_2,18.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:3681: uttarāsu tu kurvāṇo vītaśoko bhavennaraḥ // BndP_2,18.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3683: rājyabhāgī dhaniṣṭhāsu prāpnuyā dvipulaṃ dhanam // BndP_2,18.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3691: kṛtsnāṃ balena so 'kliṣṭho labhdhvā ca praśaśāsa ha // BndP_2,18.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:3692: iti śrī brahāmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpe nakṣatraśrāddhaṃ nāma aṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ // 18//
GP12brndp2_u:3693: śaṃyuruvāca kiṃ sviddattaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tu tṛptidaṃ vadatāṃ vara /
GP12brndp2_u:3695: bṛhaspatiruvāca havīṣi śrāddhakalpe tu yāni śrāddhavido viduḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3696: tāni me śṛṇu sarvāṇi phalaṃ caiṣāṃ yathātatham // BndP_2,19.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:3698: dattena māsaṃ prīyante śrāddhena hi pitāmahāḥ // BndP_2,19.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:3699: matsyaiḥ prīṇanti dvau māsau trīnmāsānhāriṇena tu /
GP12brndp2_u:3700: śāśena caturo māsānpañca prīṇāti śākunaiḥ // BndP_2,19.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:3704: gavayasya tu māṃsena tṛptiḥ syāddaśamāsikī // BndP_2,19.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:3706: śrāddhe ca tṛptidaṃ gavyaṃ payaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ dvijāḥ // BndP_2,19.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:3708: pāyasaṃ madhusarpirbhyāṃ chāyāyāṃ kuñjarasya ca // BndP_2,19.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:3710: atra gāthāḥ pitṛgītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ // BndP_2,19.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:3712: api naḥ sa kule yāyādyo no dadyāt trayodaśīm // BndP_2,19.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3713: ājena sarvalohena varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3714: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
GP12brndp2_u:3715: gaurīṃ vāpyudvahedbhāryāṃ nālaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet // BndP_2,19.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3716: śaṃyuruvāca gayādīnāṃ phalaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3717: dātṝṇāṃ caiva yatpuṇyaṃ nikhilena pravīhi me // BndP_2,19.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3719: pitṛkṣaye hi tatputra tasmāttatrākṣayaṃ smṛtam // BndP_2,19.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3722: phalaṃ vṛṣasya vakṣyāmi gadato me nibodhata // BndP_2,19.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:3727: sarvaṃ tadakṣayaṃ tasya pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,19.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:3729: madhukulyāḥ pitṝṃstasya hyakṣayāśca bhavanti vai // BndP_2,19.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:3731: tṛptistu yā pitṝṇāṃ vai sā vṛṣeṇeha kalpate // BndP_2,19.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:3733: madhu vāmadhumiśraṃ vā sarvamevākṣayaṃ bhavet // BndP_2,19.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:3734: na brāhmaṇaṃ parikṣeta sadā deyaṃ hi mānavaiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3735: daivekarmaṇi pitrye ca śrūyate vai parīkṣaṇam // BndP_2,19.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:3737: ye ca bhāṣāvidaḥ kecidye ca vyākaraṇe ratāḥ // BndP_2,19.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:3739: triṇāciketaḥ pañcāgniḥ sa sauparṇaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit // BndP_2,19.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:3741: puṇyeṣu yaśca tīrtheṣu kṛtasnānaḥ kṛtavrataḥ // BndP_2,19.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:3743: ye ca satyavratā nityaṃ svadharmaniratāśca ye // BndP_2,19.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:3749: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam // BndP_2,19.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:3759: stavakaḥ sūpakāraśca yaśca mitrāṇi nindati // BndP_2,19.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:3763: vikrīṇāti ca yo brahmavratāni niyamāṃstathā // BndP_2,19.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:3765: yaccavāṇijake dattaṃ neha nāmutra saṃbhavet // BndP_2,19.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:3767: tathā pāṇavike vai ca kāruke dharmavarjite // BndP_2,19.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:3770: bhasmanīva hutaṃ havyaṃ dattaṃ paunarbhave dvijaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3771: ṣaṣṭiṃ kāṇaḥ śataṃ ṣaṇḍhaḥ śvitrī pañcaśatānyapi // BndP_2,19.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:3773: bhraśyeddhi sa phalāttasmātpradātā yastu bāliśaḥ // BndP_2,19.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:3777: śvā caiva brahmahā caiva nāvekṣeta kathañcana // BndP_2,19.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:3779: rākṣasānāṃ tilāḥ proktāḥ śunāṃ parivṛtāstathā // BndP_2,19.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:3782: nadītīreṣu ramyeṣu saritsu ca sarassu ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3783: vivikteṣu ca prīyante datteneha pitāmahāḥ // BndP_2,19.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:3789: śuklapakṣe ca pūrvāṅṇe śrāddhaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi // BndP_2,19.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:3790: kṛṣṇapakṣe 'paraṅṇe tu rauhiṇaṃ vai na laṅghayet /
GP12brndp2_u:3792: sadā vai pitaraḥ pūjyāḥ saṃ prāptau deśakālayoḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3793: pitṛbhaktyaiva tu naro yogaṃ prāpnoti durllabham // BndP_2,19.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:3794: dhyānena mokṣaṃ gaccheddhi hitvā karma śubhāśubham /
GP12brndp2_u:3797: amṛtaṃ guhyamuddhṛtya yoge yogavidāṃ varāḥ // BndP_2,19.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:3799: devānāṃ paramaṃ guhyamṛṣīṇāṃ ca parāyaṇam // BndP_2,19.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:3803: bṛhaspatiruvāca yasmaiśrāddhāni deyāni yacca dattaṃ mahatphalam /
GP12brndp2_u:3804: yeṣu cāpyakṣayaṃ śrāddhaṃ tīrtheṣu ca guhāsu ca // BndP_2,19.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:3806: śrutvemaṃ śrāddhakalpaṃ ca na kuryādyastu mānavaḥ // BndP_2,19.57 //
GP12brndp2_u:3808: parivādo na karttavyo yogināṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,19.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:3811: sa gacchennarakaṃ ghoraṃ śrotāpyasya na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3815: sahi kālaṃ ciraṃ majjennarake nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3816: kuṃbhīpākeṣu pacyante jihvācchede punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_2,19.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:3817: samudre ca yathā loṣaṭastadbatsīdanti te narāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3818: manasā karmaṇā vācā dveṣaṃ yogeṣu varjayet /
GP12brndp2_u:3819: protyānantaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkta iha vāpi na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,19.62 //
GP12brndp2_u:3820: na pārago vindati paramātmanastrilokamadhye carati svakarmamiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3821: ṛco yajuḥ sāma tadaṅgapārage 'vikārametaṃ hyanavāpya sīdati //
GP12brndp2_u:3823: yaḥ syāccaturviśatitattvapāragaḥ sa pārago nādhyayanasya pāragaḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:3825: pratyāharedyogapathaṃ na yo dvijo na sarvapāra kramapāragocaraḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:3826: vedasya veditavyaṃ ca vedyaṃ vindati yogavit /
GP12brndp2_u:3828: vedaṃ ca veditavyaṃ ca viditvā vai yathāsthitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3829: evaṃ vedavidaḥ prāhuranyaṃ vai vedapāragam // BndP_2,19.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:3831: prāpnotyāyuḥ prajāścaiva pitṛbhakto na saśayaḥ // BndP_2,19.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:3832: śraddhayā śrāddhakalpaṃ tu yastvimaṃ niyataḥ paṭhet /
GP12brndp2_u:3838: tīrthādīnāṃ phalaṃ prāpya dānādīnāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3840: iha cāpi parā puṣṭhistasmātkurvīta nityaśaḥ // BndP_2,19.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:3841: imaṃ vidhiṃ yo hi paṭhedatandritaḥ samāhitaḥ saṃsadi parvasaṃdhiṣu /
GP12brndp2_u:3842: apatyabhāgī ca pareṇa tejasā divaukasāṃ sa vrajate salokatām //
GP12brndp2_u:3845: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpe brahmaṇaparīkṣā nāma ekonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // 19//
GP12brndp2_u:3846: bṛhaspatiruvāca ityete pitaro devā devānāmapi devatāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3847: saptasvete sthitā nityaṃ sthāneṣu pitaro 'vyayāḥ // BndP_2,20.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:3851: śeṣāstu varṇiṃnāṃ jñeyā iti sarve prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_2,20.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:3855: tathā saṃkarajātyaśca mlecchāścāpi yajanti vai // BndP_2,20.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3856: pitṛṃstu yo yajedbhaktyā pitaraḥ prīṇayanti te /
GP12brndp2_u:3857: pitaraḥ puṣṭikāmasya prajākāmasya vā punaḥ // BndP_2,20.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:3858: puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ tu svargaṃ ca prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3861: na hi yogagatiḥ sūkṣmā pitṝṇāṃ jñāyate naraiḥ // BndP_2,20.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:3863: sarveṣāṃ rājataṃ pātramatha vā rajatānvitam // BndP_2,20.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:3864: pāvanaṃ hyuttamaṃ proktaṃ devānāṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha /
GP12brndp2_u:3867: sarvatra varttamānāste piṇḍāḥ prīṇanti vai pitṝn // BndP_2,20.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3869: yathā goṣṭhe pranaṣṭāṃ vai vatso vindati mātaram // BndP_2,20.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3871: nāmagotraṃ ca mantraṃ ca dattamannaṃ nayanti tam // BndP_2,20.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3873: evameṣā sthitā sattā brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ // BndP_2,20.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:3877: kīrttitāḥ pitaraste vai tava putra yathākramam // BndP_2,20.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:3878: śaṃyuruvāca aho divyastvayā tāta pitṛsargastu kīrtitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3880: dānāni saha śaucena kīrttitāni phalāni ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3885: satre tu vitate pūrvaṃ tathā varṣasahasrake /
GP12brndp2_u:3887: gatāni tatra varṣāṇāṃ pañcāśacca śatāni vai /
GP12brndp2_u:3891: lokānāṃ ca hitārthāya brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā // BndP_2,20.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:3892: sūta uvāca evaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ pūrvaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ putreṇa dhīmatā /
GP12brndp2_u:3893: provāca pitṛsargaṃ tu yaścaiva samudāhṛta // BndP_2,20.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:3894: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpo nāma viṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 20//
GP12brndp2_u:3905: gantuṃ vyavasito rājandaivena ca niyojitaḥ // BndP_2,21.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3908: kañcidarthamahaṃ tāta mātaraṃ tvāṃ ca sāmpratam /
GP12brndp2_u:3915: sadīyaṃ tena tatpārśvaṃ gantuṃ māmanujānata // BndP_2,21.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3916: vasiṣṭha uvāca iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃbhrāntaṃ samudīritam /
GP12brndp2_u:3917: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktau sāśrunetrau babhūvatuḥ // BndP_2,21.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3922: tatra gatvā yathānyāyaṃ taṃ śuśrūṣā parāyaṇaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3923: kañcitkālaṃ tayorvatsa prītaye vasa tadgṛhe // BndP_2,21.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:3926: kṣaṇārddhamapi śaktāḥ stho na vinā putradarśanam /
GP12brndp2_u:3930: vasiṣṭha uvāca ityuktastau parikramya praṇamya ca mahāmatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3937: dadarśa rāmo rājendra sa pitāmahamagrataḥ // BndP_2,21.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:3945: āsasāda śanai rāmaḥ samīpe vinayānvitaḥ // BndP_2,21.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:3955: anāyāsena te vṛttirvartate cātha karhicit // BndP_2,21.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:3957: tathā svānugataṃ pitrorbhrātṝṇāṃ caiva ceṣṭitam // BndP_2,21.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:3965: yathā cābhyāṃ pradiṣṭena yayā vaurvāśramaṃ prati // BndP_2,21.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:4007: pituḥ pitāmahaṃ ddaṣṭvā rāmastasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,21.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:4015: abhivādya yathānyāyaṃ khyātiṃ ca vinayānvitaḥ // BndP_2,21.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:4021: kuśalaṃ khalu te vatsa pitrośca kimanāmayam // BndP_2,21.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:4027: piturmātuśca vṛttānta bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām // BndP_2,21.66 //
GP12brndp2_u:4029: etadanyacca sakalaṃ bhṛgoḥ sapraśrayaṃ mudā // BndP_2,21.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:4032: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā viśeṣeṇa bhṛguḥ prīto 'bhyanandata /
GP12brndp2_u:4041: śruṇu vatsa vaco mahya yattvāṃ vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam // BndP_2,21.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:4047: prītimutpādya tasya tvaṃ bhaktyānanyagayā cirāt // BndP_2,21.76 //
GP12brndp2_u:4049: tarasā tava bhaktyā ca prīto bhavati śaṅkaraḥ // BndP_2,21.77 //
GP12brndp2_u:4050: kariṣyati ca te sarvaṃ manasā yadyadicchasi /
GP12brndp2_u:4053: tvayā hitārthaṃ devānāṃ karaṇīyaṃ suduṣkaram // BndP_2,21.79 //
GP12brndp2_u:4057: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde ekaviṃśati tamaudhyāyaḥ vasiṣṭha uvāca ityevamukto bhṛguṇā tathetyuktvā praṇamya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:4064: himavantaṃ girivaraṃ yayau rāmo mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,22.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:4068: tīrtheṣu kṣetramukhyeṣu nivasanvā yayau śanaiḥ // BndP_2,22.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:4144: tasya praviśya gahanaṃ vanaṃ rāmo mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,22.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:4146: sa tatra vicarandikṣu hariṇībhiḥ samantataḥ // BndP_2,22.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:4179: vicacāra ciraṃ rāmo mudā paramayā yutaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4192: sa tasya tīre vipulaṃ kṛtvāśramapadaṃ śubham // BndP_2,22.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:4193: rāmo matimatāṃ śreṣṭhastapase ca mano dadhe /
GP12brndp2_u:4198: aniketaḥ sa varṣāsu śiśire jalasaṃśrayaḥ // BndP_2,22.71 //
GP12brndp2_u:4214: tataḥ sa niṣphalaṃ rūpamaiśvaraṃ yannirañjanam // BndP_2,22.79 //
GP12brndp2_u:4220: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīye upoddhātapāde vasiṣṭhasagarasaṃvāde arcunopākhyāne jāmadagnyatapaścaraṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 22//
GP12brndp2_u:4221: vasiṣṭha uvāca tapasvinaṃ tadā rāmamekāgramanasaṃ bhave /
GP12brndp2_u:4232: praśasya tasya te sarveprayayuḥ svaṃ svamāśramam // BndP_2,23.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:4250: tataḥ sa śīghramutthāya samīpamupasṛtya ca // BndP_2,23.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:4257: samaśca sarvabhūteṣu na ca pitrādayo 'pi me /
GP12brndp2_u:4262: jānate tadhyathā sarve deśo 'yaṃ madupāśrayaḥ // BndP_2,23.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:4264: ityeṣa mama vṛttāntaḥ kārtsnyena kathitastava // BndP_2,23.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:4265: tvaṃ ca me brūhi tattvena nijavṛttamaśeṣataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4267: udyato 'nyatra vā gantuṃ kiṃ vā tava cikīrṣitam // BndP_2,23.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:4268: vasiṣṭha uvāca ityevamuktaḥ prahasaṃstena rāmo mahādyutiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4269: tūṣṇīṃ kṣaṇamiva sthitvā dadhyau kiñcidavāṅmukhaḥ // BndP_2,23.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:4272: kiṃ tu me mahatīṃ śaṅkāṃ tanurasya tanoti vai /
GP12brndp2_u:4278: jāmadagnyo 'smi bhadraṃ te rāmo nāmnā tu bhārgavaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4280: tapasā sarvalokeśaṃ bhaktyā ca niyamena ca /
GP12brndp2_u:4289: na cedbhavati me hāniḥ svakṛterniyamasya ca // BndP_2,23.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:4296: vasiṣṭha uvāca iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā sa bhūyo bhṛgupuṅgavam /
GP12brndp2_u:4300: kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ loke bhavato 'nyasya vā kvacit /
GP12brndp2_u:4303: darśanaṃ saha saṃvāsaḥ saṃbhāṣaṇamathāpi ca // BndP_2,23.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:4305: svasaṃśrayaṃ parityajya kvāhaṃ yāsye bubhukṣitaḥ // BndP_2,23.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:4307: ito 'nyasmin gāmiṣyāmi dūre nāhaṃ viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,23.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:4310: vasiṣṭha uvāca tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kiñcitkopasamanvitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4315: sa kathaṃ na parityājyaḥ sujanaiḥ syāttu durmate // BndP_2,23.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:4321: vyathā cābhihatānāṃ tu vidyate bhavato 'nyathā // BndP_2,23.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:4327: tvayā me kṛtyadoṣasya hāniśca na bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,23.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:4330: kṣaṇārddhamapi te pāpa śreyasī neha saṃsthitiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4331: viruddhācaraṇo nityaṃ dharmadriṣ ko labhecca śām // BndP_2,23.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:4332: vasiṣṭha uvāca rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā prīto 'pi tamidaṃ vacaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4333: uvāca saṃkruddha iva vyādharūpī pinākadhṛk // BndP_2,23.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:4335: kutastvaṃ prathamo jñānī kutaḥ śaṃbhuḥ kutastapaḥ // BndP_2,23.57 //
GP12brndp2_u:4336: kutastvaṃ kliśyase mūḍha tapasā tena te 'dhunā /
GP12brndp2_u:4337: ghruvaṃ mithyāpravṛttasya na hi tuṣyati śaṅkaraḥ // BndP_2,23.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:4339: pratapatyabudho marttyastvāṃ vinā kaḥ mudurmate // BndP_2,23.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:4340: atha vā ca gataṃ me 'dya yuktametadasaṃśayam /
GP12brndp2_u:4341: saṃpūjya pūjakaviddhau śaṃbhostava ca saṃgamaḥ // BndP_2,23.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:4342: tvayā pūjayituṃ yuktaḥ sa eva bhuvane rataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4343: saṃpūjako 'pi tasya tvaṃ yogyo nātra vicāraṇā // BndP_2,23.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:4347: upadiṣṭo 'si tatkartuṃ nocedevaṃ kathaṃ kṛthāḥ // BndP_2,23.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:4355: mātṛdruhāmavehi tvaṃ na kvacitkila niṣkṛtiḥ // BndP_2,23.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:4356: ahiṃsālakṣaṇo dharmo lokeṣu yadi te mataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4357: svahastena kathaṃ rāma mātaraṃ kṛttavānasi // BndP_2,23.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:4363: tarhi garhaya māṃ kāmaṃ nirupya manasā svayam // BndP_2,23.71 //
GP12brndp2_u:4367: varttāmi sāpi me vṛttirvidhātrā vihitā purā // BndP_2,23.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:4368: māṃsena yāvatā me syānnityaṃ pitrādi poṣaṇam /
GP12brndp2_u:4371: tadetatsaṃpradhārya tvaṃ nindavā māṃ praśaṃsa vā // BndP_2,23.75 //
GP12brndp2_u:4372: sādhu vāsādhu vā karma yasya yadvihitaṃ purā /
GP12brndp2_u:4375: ahaṃ tu sarvabhāvena mitrādibharaṇe rataḥ // BndP_2,23.77 //
GP12brndp2_u:4376: saṃtyajya pitaraṃ vṛddhaṃ vinihatya ca mātaram /
GP12brndp2_u:4377: bhūtvā tu dhārmikastvaṃ tu tapaścartumihāgataḥ // BndP_2,23.78 //
GP12brndp2_u:4378: ye tu mūlavidasteṣāṃ vispaṣṭaṃ yatra darśanam /
GP12brndp2_u:4381: tasmādalaṃ te tapasā niṣphalena bhṛgūdvaha // BndP_2,23.80 //
GP12brndp2_u:4383: yāhi rāma tvamanyatra yatra vā na vidurjanāḥ // BndP_2,23.81 //
GP12brndp2_u:4384: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde trayoviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp2_u:4385: vasiṣṭha uvāca ityuktastena bhūpāla rāmo matimatāṃ varaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4387: rāma uvāca kastvaṃ brūhi mahābhāga na vai prākṛtapūruṣaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4391: indro vahniryamo dhātā varuṇo vā dhanādhipaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4392: īśānastapano brahmā vāyuḥ somo gururguhaḥ // BndP_2,24.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:4394: anubhāvena jātiste hṛdiśaṅkāṃ tanoti me // BndP_2,24.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:4396: ko vā tvaṃ vapuṣānena brūhi māṃ samupāgataḥ // BndP_2,24.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:4397: atha vā jagatāṃ nāthaḥ sarvajñaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4412: kastvaṃ me darśayātmānaṃ baddho 'yaṃ te mayāñjaliḥ // BndP_2,24.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:4414: upaviśya tato bhūmau dhyānamāste samāhitaḥ // BndP_2,24.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:4422: dadarśa devaṃ tenaiva vapuṣā purataḥ sthitam // BndP_2,24.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:4424: āvirbhūtaṃ mahārāja dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ sasaṃbhramam // BndP_2,24.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:4426: papāta pādayorbhūmau bhaktyā tasya mahāmatiḥ // BndP_2,24.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:4432: tuṣṭāva devadeveśaṃ puraḥ sthitvā kṛtājaliḥ // BndP_2,24.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:4434: namaḥ śarvāya śāntāya śāśvatāya namonamaḥ // BndP_2,24.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:4436: namaste bhūtanāthāya bhūtavāsāya te namaḥ // BndP_2,24.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:4439: śaraṇaṃ bhava me śarva tvadbhaktasya jagatpate /
GP12brndp2_u:4440: bhūyo 'nanyāśrayāṇāṃ tu tvameva hi parāyaṇam // BndP_2,24.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:4444: tvāmṛte tava sarveśa samyak śakroti veditum // BndP_2,24.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:4446: nānyāsti me gatistubhyaṃ namo bhūyo namo namaḥ // BndP_2,24.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:4447: vasiṣṭha uvāca iti saṃstūyamānastu kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ puraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4449: bhagavānuvāca prīto 'smi bhavate tāta tapasānena sāṃpratam /
GP12brndp2_u:4451: dāsye cābhi mataṃ save bhavate 'haṃ tvayā vṛtam /
GP12brndp2_u:4452: bhakto hi me tvamatyarthaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // BndP_2,24.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:4455: nāstrāṇāṃ dhāraṇe vatsa vidyate śaktiradya te /
GP12brndp2_u:4456: raudrāṇāṃ tena bhūyo 'pi tapo ghoraṃ samācara // BndP_2,24.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:4457: parītya pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu ca kramāt /
GP12brndp2_u:4461: antarhite jagannāthe rāmo natvā tu śaṅkaram /
GP12brndp2_u:4463: tataḥ sa pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ parikramya yathākramam /
GP12brndp2_u:4469: evaṃ krameṇa tīrtheṣu snātvā caiva vasuṃdharām /
GP12brndp2_u:4472: jagām bhūyastaṃ deśaṃ yatra pūrvamuvāsa saḥ // BndP_2,24.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:4484: devānāṃ varadaḥ śaṃbhurmaho daramuvāca ha // BndP_2,24.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:4490: jagāma vāyuvegena yatra rāmo vyavasthitaḥ // BndP_2,24.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:4491: samāsādya sa taṃ deśaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ mahāmunim /
GP12brndp2_u:4510: bāṣpattu siktakāyena sa tu gatvā harāntikam // BndP_2,24.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:4516: rāmaṃ madhurayā vācā prahasannāha sādaram // BndP_2,24.66 //
GP12brndp2_u:4520: jahi daityagaṇānsarvānsamarthastvaṃ hi me mataḥ // BndP_2,24.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:4526: na śakyā hantumekasya śakyāḥ syaste kathaṃ mama // BndP_2,24.71 //
GP12brndp2_u:4530: śaivamastramayaṃ tejo dadau tasmai mahātmane // BndP_2,24.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:4532: rāmapāha prasannātmā gīrvāṇānāṃ tu śṛṇvatam // BndP_2,24.74 //
GP12brndp2_u:4536: svayameva ca vetsi tvaṃ yathāvadyuddhakauśalam // BndP_2,24.76 //
GP12brndp2_u:4537: vasiṣṭha uvāca evamuktastato rāmaḥ śaṃbhunā taṃ praṇamya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:4546: kuddhaḥ paraśunā tena nijaghāna mahāsurān // BndP_2,24.81 //
GP12brndp2_u:4548: cacāra samare rāmaḥ kruddhaḥ kāla ivāparaḥ // BndP_2,24.82 //
GP12brndp2_u:4550: kṣaṇena nāśayāmāsa rāmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ // BndP_2,24.83 //
GP12brndp2_u:4552: dadṛśuḥ sarvato rāmaṃ hataśeṣā bhayānvitāḥ // BndP_2,24.84 //
GP12brndp2_u:4561: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:4563: vasiṣṭha uvāca tatasta draktiyogena sa prītātmā jagatpatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4571: rāma uvāca namaste devadeveśa namaste parameśvara /
GP12brndp2_u:4572: namaste jagato nātha namaste tripurāntaka // BndP_2,25.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:4606: klpānte rudrarūpāya parāpara vide namaḥ // BndP_2,25.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:4612: tava yattanna jānanti yogino 'pi sadāmalāḥ // BndP_2,25.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:4614: saṃsaranti bhave nūnaṃ na tatkarmātmakāściram // BndP_2,25.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:4617: sa eva dakṣaḥ sa kṛtī sa muniḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4620: viduṣāmapi mūḍhena sa mayā jñāyate katham // BndP_2,25.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:4624: prītaśca bhava deveśa nanu tvaṃ bhaktavatsalaḥ // BndP_2,25.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:4625: vasiṣṭha uvāca iti stutastadā tena bhaktyā rāmeṇa śaṅkaraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4628: tapasā mayi bhaktyā ca stotreṇa ca viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,25.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:4631: vasiṣṭha uvāca ityukto devadevena taṃ praṇamya bhṛgūdvahaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4633: yadi deva prasannastvaṃ vārarhe 'smi ca yadyaham /
GP12brndp2_u:4635: astre śastre ca śāstre ca na matto 'bhyadhiko bhavet /
GP12brndp2_u:4638: dadau rāmāya suprītaḥ samantrāṇi kramānnṛpa // BndP_2,25.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:4642: iṣudhī cākṣayaśarau dadau rāmāya śaṅkaraḥ // BndP_2,25.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:4644: sarvaśastrasahaṃ citraṃ kavacaṃ ca mahādhanam // BndP_2,25.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:4645: ajeyatvaṃ ca yuddheṣu śauryaṃ cāpratimaṃ bhuvi /
GP12brndp2_u:4646: svecchayā dhāraṇe śāktiṃ prāṇānāṃ ca narādhipa // BndP_2,25.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:4648: tapaḥ prabhāvaṃ ca mahatpradadau bhārgavāya saḥ // BndP_2,25.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:4656: yadā kṛtyaṃ mamaitena tadānīṃ tvaṃ mayā smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4657: rathacāpādikaṃ sarvaṃ prahiṇu tvaṃ madantikam // BndP_2,25.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:4658: vasiṣṭha uvāca tathetyuktvā gate tasminbhṛguvaryo mahodare /
GP12brndp2_u:4659: kṛtakṛtyo gurujanaṃ draṣṭuṃ gantumiyeṣa saḥ // BndP_2,25.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:4680: ityuktvā tu gate tasminrāmo vegena vismitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4681: patitaṃ dvijaputraṃ taṃ kṛpayā vyavapadyata // BndP_2,25.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:4687: gatabhīrāha kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathaṃ veha samāgataḥ // BndP_2,25.62 //
GP12brndp2_u:4691: hate 'pi tasminnakhilā bhānti vai tanmayā diśaḥ // BndP_2,25.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:4692: tvāmeva manye sakalaṃ pitā mātā sutdṛdgurū /
GP12brndp2_u:4705: vasiṣṭha uvāca iti pṛṣṭastadā tena svavṛttāntamaśeṣataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4708: sthitvā nāticiraṃ kālamatha gantumiyeṣa saḥ // BndP_2,25.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:4718: dṛṣṭvā khyātiṃ ca so 'bhyetya vinayenābhyavādayat // BndP_2,25.77 //
GP12brndp2_u:4727: taṃ cābhivādya medhāvī tena ca pratinanditaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4728: uvāsa tatra tatprītyā dināni katicinnṛpa // BndP_2,25.82 //
GP12brndp2_u:4731: avandata pituḥ pitrornatvā pādau pṛthak pṛthak /
GP12brndp2_u:4732: tau ca taṃ nṛpa saṃharṣāccāśiṣā pratyanandatām // BndP_2,25.84 //
GP12brndp2_u:4744: kiṃ kṛtaṃ putra ko vāyaṃ kutra vā tvamupasthitaḥ // BndP_2,25.90 //
GP12brndp2_u:4745: kathaṃ saha sakāśe tvamāsthito vātra vāgataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4747: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:4749: vaśiṣṭha uvāca iti pṛṣṭastadā tābhyāṃ rāmo rājankṛtāñjaliḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4757: tau ca tenoditaṃ sarvaṃ śrutvā tatkarma vistaram /
GP12brndp2_u:4772: āśamaṃ prati gacchatsu munimukhyeṣu karmiṣu // BndP_2,26.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:4775: sthāne munikumāreṣu taṃ dohaṃ hi nayatsu ca /
GP12brndp2_u:4787: pratihatya diśaḥ sarvā vivṛṇvāne ca medinīm /
GP12brndp2_u:4788: savitaryudayaṃ yāti naiśe tamasi naśyati // BndP_2,26.20 //

GP12brndp2_u:5259: na marttavyantvayā sarvo jīvanbhadrāṇi paśyati // BndP_2,30.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:5265: vasiṣṭha uvāca iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā dhṛtimālaṃbya reṇukā /

GP12brndp2_u:5289: yajñasya tapaso vīya mamāpi śubhamasti cet /
GP12brndp2_u:5293: dṛṣṭvā tatra sthitaṃ vandyaṃ bhṛguṃ svasya pitāmaham /
GP12brndp2_u:5294: nanāma bhaktyā nṛpate kṛtāñjaliruvāca ha // BndP_2,30.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:5295: jamadagniruvāca dhanyo 'haṃ kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me // BndP_2,30.62 //

GP12brndp2_u:5302: atha satkṛtya sa bhṛguṃ papraccha vinayānvitaḥ /

GP12brndp2_u:5306: vasiṣṭha uvāca evaṃ sa pṛṣṭo matimānbhṛguḥ sarvavidīśvaraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5307: ciraṃ dhyātvā samālocya kāraṇaṃ prāha bhūpate // BndP_2,30.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:5308: bhṛguruvāca śṛṇu tāta mahābhāga bījamasya hi karmaṇaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5309: yaśca vai kṛtavānpāpaṃ sarvajñasya tavānagha // BndP_2,30.69 //
GP12brndp2_u:5310: śaptaḥ purā vasiṣṭhena nāśārthaṃ sa mahīpatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5311: dvijāparādhato mūḍha vīryaṃ te vinaśiṣyate // BndP_2,30.70 //
GP12brndp2_u:5317: triḥ saptakṛtvo niḥkṣatrāṃ kariṣye pṛthivīmimām // BndP_2,30.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:5320: sa tu rājā mahābhāgo vṛddhānāṃ paryupāsitā /
GP12brndp2_u:5322: sākṣādbhakto mahātmā ca tadvadhe pātakaṃ bhavet /
GP12brndp2_u:5325: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyābhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite triṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 30//
GP12brndp2_u:5326: sagara uvāca brahmaputra mahābhāga vada bhārgavaceṣṭitam /
GP12brndp2_u:5327: yaccakāra mahāvīryyo rājñaḥ kruddho hi karmaṇā // BndP_2,31.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:5328: vasiṣṭha uvāca gate tasminmahābhāge bhṛgo pitṛparāyaṇaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5330: paraśurāma uvāca aho paśyata mūḍhatvaṃrājño hyutpathagāminaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5333: śubhaṃ vāpyaśubhaṃ sarve prakurvanti vimohitāḥ // BndP_2,31.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5334: śṛṇavantu ṛṣayaḥ sarve pratijñā kriyate mayā /
GP12brndp2_u:5340: jamadagniruvāca śruṇu rāma pravakṣyāmi satāṃ dharmaṃ sanātanam /
GP12brndp2_u:5341: yacchrutvā mānavāḥ sarve jāyante dharmakāriṇaḥ // BndP_2,31.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:5345: teṣāṃ caivākṣayā lokāḥ satataṃ sādhukāriṇām // BndP_2,31.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5347: na ca kṣobhamavāpnoti sa sādhuḥ parikīrtthate // BndP_2,31.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:5348: tāḍayettāḍayantaṃ yo na ca sādhuḥ sa pāpabhāk /
GP12brndp2_u:5349: kṣamayār'haṇatāṃ prāptāḥ sādhavo brāhmaṇā vayam // BndP_2,31.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5351: tasmānnivāraye tvādya kṣamāṃ kuru tapaścara // BndP_2,31.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5352: vasiṣṭha uvāca evaṃ pitrā samādiṣṭaṃ vijñāya nṛpanandana /
GP12brndp2_u:5354: paraśurāma uvāca śṛṇu tāta mahāprājña vi5ptiṃ mama sāṃpratam /
GP12brndp2_u:5355: bhavatā śama uddiṣṭaḥ sādhūnāṃ sumahātmanām // BndP_2,31.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:5357: karttavyo duṣṭaceṣṭeṣu na śamaḥ sukhado bhavet // BndP_2,31.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:5358: tasmādasya vadhaḥ kāryaḥ kārttavīryasya vai mayā /
GP12brndp2_u:5360: jamadagniruvāca śṛṇu rāma mahābhāga vaco mama samāhitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5361: kariṣyasi yathā bhāvi tathā naivānyathā bhavet // BndP_2,31.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:5362: ito vrajatvaṃ brahmāṇāṃ bṛccha tāta hitāhitam /
GP12brndp2_u:5363: sa yadvadiṣyati vibhustatkarttā nātra saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,31.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:5364: vasiṣṭha uvāca evamuktaḥ sa pitaraṃ namaskṛtya mahāmatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5371: vidyādharīṇāṃ nṛtyaṃ ca paśyantaṃ sasmitaṃ mudā // BndP_2,31.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5375: dṛṣṭvā tamavyayaṃ bhaktyā praṇanāma bhṛgūdvahaḥ // BndP_2,31.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:5377: papraccha kuśalaṃ vatsa kathamāgamanaṃ kṛthāḥ // BndP_2,31.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5379: vṛttāntaṃ kārttavīryasya pituḥ svasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,31.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:5383: sṛṣṭi reṣā bhagavataḥ saṃbhavetkṛpayā baṭo // BndP_2,31.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:5385: tannāśakāriṇī caiva pratijñā bhavatā kṛtā // BndP_2,31.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5387: ekasya rājño doṣeṇa pituḥ paribhavena ca // BndP_2,31.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:5389: āvirbhūtā tirobhūtā harereva punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_2,31.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:5390: avyarthā tvatpratijñā tu bhavitrī prāktanena ca /
GP12brndp2_u:5393: pṛthivyāṃ bahavo bhūpāḥ saṃti śaṅkarakiṅkarāḥ // BndP_2,31.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:5397: upāye tu samārabdhe sarve sidhyantyupakramāḥ // BndP_2,31.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:5401: yathākathaṃ ca vijñāpya śaṅkaraṃ labhadurlabham // BndP_2,31.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:5403: divyapāśupataṃ cāpi dāsyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,31.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:5404: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite ekatriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 31//
GP12brndp2_u:5405: vasiṣṭha uvāca brahmaṇo vacanaṃ śrutvā sa praṇamya jagadgurum /
GP12brndp2_u:5406: prasannacetāḥ subhṛśaṃ śivalokaṃ jagāma ha // BndP_2,32.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:5413: vasaṃti yatra yogīndrāḥ siddhāḥ pāśupatāḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5414: koṭikalpatapaḥ puṇyāḥ śāntā nirmatsarā janāḥ // BndP_2,32.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5416: yogena yoginā sṛṣṭaṃ svecchayā śaṅkareṇa hi // BndP_2,32.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5417: śilpināṃ guruṇā svapne na dṛṣṭaṃ niśvakarmaṇā /
GP12brndp2_u:5430: vibhūtibhūṣitāṅgau ca vyāghracarmāṃbarau ca tau // BndP_2,32.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5432: tau dṛṣṭvā manasā bhītaḥ kiñcidāha vinītavat // BndP_2,32.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:5435: tautu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā gṛhītvājñāṃ śivasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:5438: tatrātiramyāṃ siddhaughaiḥ samākīrṇāṃ sabhāṃ dvijaḥ // BndP_2,32.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:5448: mūrdhnā namāma taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ paramayā mudā // BndP_2,32.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:5450: nandīśvaraṃ mahākālaṃ vīrabhadraṃ ca tatpuraḥ // BndP_2,32.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5451: kroḍe durgāṃ śatabhujāṃ dṛṣṭvā natvātha tāmapi /
GP12brndp2_u:5452: stotuṃ pracakrame vidvāngirā gadgadayā vibhum // BndP_2,32.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:5457: vedā na śaktā yaṃ stotu mavāṅmanasagocaram /
GP12brndp2_u:5460: na yaṃ viduryathātattvaṃ taṃ namāmi parātparam // BndP_2,32.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:5462: līyante ca punaryasmiṃstaṃ namāmi jaganmayam // BndP_2,32.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:5464: sorddhvalokaṃ sapātālaṃ taṃ namāmi haraṃ param // BndP_2,32.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5467: yaḥ kālarūpo jagadādikarttā pātā pṛthagrūpadharo jaganmayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5468: rarttā punā rudravapustathānte taṃ kālarūpaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye //
GP12brndp2_u:5469: ityevamuktvā sa tu bhārgavo mudā paṣāta tasyāṅghri samīpa āturaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5470: utthāpya taṃ vāmakareṇa līlayā dadhre tadā mūrdhni karaṃ kṛpārṇavaḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:5473: śiva uvāca kastvaṃ vaṭo kasyakule prasūtaḥ kiṃ kāryamuddiśya bhavānihāgataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5474: vinirddiśāhaṃ tava bhaktibhāvataḥ prītaḥ pradadyāṃ bhavato manogatam //
GP12brndp2_u:5475: ityevamuktaḥ sa bhṛgurmahātmanā hareṇa viśvārttihareṇa sādaram /
GP12brndp2_u:5476: punaśca natvā vibudhāṃ pati guruṃ kṛpāsamudraṃ samuvāca satvaram //
GP12brndp2_u:5477: paraśurāma uvāca bhṛgoścāhaṃ kule jāto jamadagnisutau vibho /
GP12brndp2_u:5478: rāmo nāma jagadvandyaṃ tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // BndP_2,32.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5480: taṃ prasādhaya viśveśa vāñchitaṃ kāmameva me // BndP_2,32.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:5482: ātithyaṃ kṛtavān deva jamadagniḥ pitā mama // BndP_2,32.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:5484: sā dhenustaṃ mṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā gavāṃ lokaṃ jagāma ha // BndP_2,32.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:5486: jagāma svapuraṃ paścānmātā me prārudadbhṛśam // BndP_2,32.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:5495: ityevaṃ paripūrṇā me karttā devo jagatpatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5497: vasiṣṭha uvāca ityevaṃ tadvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā durgāmukhaṃ haraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5500: uvāca ca mahārāja bhārgavaṃ vairasādhakam // BndP_2,32.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:5502: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ kopena sāhasaste mahānbaṭo // BndP_2,32.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:5505: tasmai pradattaṃ dattena śrīhareḥ kavacaṃ purā /
GP12brndp2_u:5506: śaktiratyarthavīryā ca taṃ kathaṃ hantumicchasi // BndP_2,32.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:5508: na cānyaḥ śaṅkarātputra satkāryaṃ karttumīśvaraḥ // BndP_2,32.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:5511: śiva uvāca adyaprabhṛti vipra tvaṃ mama skandasamo bhava /
GP12brndp2_u:5512: dāsyāmi mantraṃ divyaṃ te kavacaṃ ca mahāmate // BndP_2,32.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:5514: triḥ saptakṛtvo nirbhūpāṃ mahīṃ cāpi kariṣyasi // BndP_2,32.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:5520: gadāṃ śaktiṃ ca paraśuṃ śūlaṃ daṇḍamanuttamam // BndP_2,32.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:5522: namaskṛtya śivaṃ śāntaṃ durgāṃ skandaṃ gaṇeśvaram // BndP_2,32.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:5524: siddhaṃ kṛtvā śivoktaṃ tu mantraṃ kavacamuttamam // BndP_2,32.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:5526: nihatya kārttavīryaṃ taṃ sasainyaṃ sakulaṃ mudā /
GP12brndp2_u:5527: vinivṛtto gṛhaṃ prāgātpituḥ svasya bhṛgūdvahaḥ // BndP_2,32.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:5528: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite dvātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 32//
GP12brndp2_u:5529: sagara uvāca śrutaṃ sarvaṃ muniśreṣṭha kīrtyamānaṃ tvayā vibho /
GP12brndp2_u:5531: vasiṣṭha uvāca śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi kavacaṃ paramādbhutam /
GP12brndp2_u:5532: mantra ca siddhida śaśvatsādhakānāṃ sukhāvaham // BndP_2,33.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:5538: ṛṣiśchandaśca jagatī devo rājeśvaraḥ svayam // BndP_2,33.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5540: praṇavo meśiraḥ pātu śrīkṛṣṇāya namaḥ sadā // BndP_2,33.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5542: kṛṣṇeti pātu netre me kṛṣṇasvāheti tārakām // BndP_2,33.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:5543: haraye nama ityeṣa bhrūlatāṃ pātu me sadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5544: oṃ govindāya svāheti nāsikāṃ pātu saṃtatam // BndP_2,33.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:5545: gopālāya namo gaṇḍaṃ pātu me satataṃ manuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5546: klīṃ kṛṣṇāya namaḥ karṇauṃ pātu kalpatarurmama // BndP_2,33.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:5547: śrīṃ kṛṣṇāya namaḥ pātu nityaṃ me 'dharayugmakam /
GP12brndp2_u:5548: oṃ gopīśāya svāheti dantapaṅktiṃ mamāvatu // BndP_2,33.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5550: oṃ śrīkṛṣṇāya svāheti jihvikāṃ pātu me sadā // BndP_2,33.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:5551: rāmeśvarāya svāheti tālukaṃ pātu me sadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5552: rādhikeśāya svāheti kaṇṭhaṃ me pātu sarvadā // BndP_2,33.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5553: namo gopīgaṇeśāya grīvāṃ me pātu sarvadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5554: oṃ gopeśāya svāheti skandhau pātu sadā mama // BndP_2,33.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5556: udaraṃ pātu me nityaṃ mukundāya namo manuḥ // BndP_2,33.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:5557: hnīṃ śrīṅklīṅkṛṣṇāya svāhā karau pātu sadā mama /
GP12brndp2_u:5558: oṃ viṣṇave namaḥ svāhā bāhuyugmaṃ mamāvatu // BndP_2,33.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:5561: oṃ hrīṃśrīṃpadmanābhāya nābhiṃ pātu sadā mama /
GP12brndp2_u:5562: oṃ sarveśāya svāheti keśānmama sadāvatu // BndP_2,33.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:5564: oṃ mādhavāya svāheti bhālaṃ me sarvadāvatu // BndP_2,33.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:5566: namo gopījaneśāya ūrū pātu sadā mama // BndP_2,33.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:5572: svayaṃ golokanātho māmāgneyyāṃ diśi rakṣatu // BndP_2,33.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:5574: nairṛtyāṃ pātu māṃ kṛṣṇāḥ paścime pātu māṃ hariḥ // BndP_2,33.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5576: aiśānyāṃ me sadā pātu vṛndāvanavihāra kṛt // BndP_2,33.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:5578: sadaiva māmadhaḥ pātu balidhvaṃsī mahābalaḥ // BndP_2,33.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:5579: jale sthale cāntarikṣe nṛsiṃhaḥ pātu māṃ sadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5580: svapne jāgaraṇe caiva pātu māṃ mādhavaḥ svayam // BndP_2,33.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5581: sarvāntarātmā nirliptaḥ pātu māṃ sarvato vibhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5582: iti te kathitaṃ bhūpa sarvāghaughavināśanam // BndP_2,33.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:5584: mayā śrutaṃ śivamukhātpravaktavyaṃ na kasyacit // BndP_2,33.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:5586: kaṇṭhe vā dakṣiṇe bāhau so 'pi viṣṇurna saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,33.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:5588: yadi syātsiddhakavaco jīvanmukto na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,33.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5594: snānaṃ ca sarvatīrtheṣu nāsyārhanti kalāmapi // BndP_2,33.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:5596: yadi syātsiddhakavacaḥ sarvaṃ prāpnoti niścitam // BndP_2,33.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:5598: yo bhavetsiddhakavaco vijayī sa bhaved dhruvam // BndP_2,33.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:5599: rājyaṃ deyaṃ śiro deyaṃ prāṇā deyāśca bhūpate /
GP12brndp2_u:5600: etattu kavacaṃ vatsa na deyaṃ saṃkaṭe 'pi ca // BndP_2,33.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:5603: idaṃ dhṛtvā tu kavacaṃ cakravarttī bhavānbhava // BndP_2,33.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5604: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite trayastriṃśattamo
GP12brndp2_u:5605: sagara uvāca brahmaputra mahābhāga mahānme 'nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5610: yathā samāpito vīrastanme vistarato vada // BndP_2,34.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5611: kṛpāpātraṃ sa dattasya rājā rāmaḥ śivasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:5612: ubhau tau samare vīrau jaghaṭāte kathaṃ guro // BndP_2,34.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5613: vasiṣṭha uvāca śṛṇu rājanpravakṣyāmi caritaṃ pāpanāśanam /
GP12brndp2_u:5614: kārttavīryasya bhūpasya rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,34.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5615: sa rāmaḥ kavacaṃ labdhvā mantraṃ caiva gurormukhāt /
GP12brndp2_u:5616: cakāra mādhanaṃ tasya bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ // BndP_2,34.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5624: gataṃ varṣaśataṃ tatra dhyānayuktasya nityadā // BndP_2,34.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5625: ekadā tu mahārāja rāmaḥ snātuṃ gato mahān /
GP12brndp2_u:5627: mṛga ekaḥ samāyāto mṛgya yuktaḥ palāyitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5632: ubho tau pibatastatra jalaṃ śaṅkitamānasau // BndP_2,34.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:5634: sa dṛṣṭvā tatra saṃviṣṭaṃ rāmaṃ bhārgavanandanam // BndP_2,34.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:5636: sa cintayāmāsa tadā śaṅkito bhṛgunandanāt // BndP_2,34.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:5641: rāmastu tau mṛgoṃ dṛṣṭvā pibantau sabhyaṃ jalam /
GP12brndp2_u:5643: naivātra vyāghrasenādo na ca vyādho hi dṛśyate /
GP12brndp2_u:5650: śiṣyeṇa saṃyuto rāmo yāvattau cāpi saṃsthitau // BndP_2,34.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5652: rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ kathāṃ tau cakraturmudā // BndP_2,34.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:5654: asya vīrasya sāṃnidhye bhayaṃ naivāvayorbhavet // BndP_2,34.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:5656: dṛṣṭamātro hi muninā bhasmībhūto bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,34.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5658: mṛgaścovāca harṣeṇa samāviṣṭaḥ priyāṃ svakām // BndP_2,34.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:5664: pitaraṃ kārttavīryeṇa dṛṣṭvā caiva tiraskṛtam // BndP_2,34.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5667: sa brahmā diṣṭavāṃścainaṃ śivalokaṃ vrajeti ha /
GP12brndp2_u:5668: tasya tvājñāṃ samādāya gato 'sau śivasannidhim // BndP_2,34.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:5675: nityaṃ japati dharmātmā kṛṣṇasya kavacaṃ sudhīḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5677: mantra sādhayato bhadre na ca tatsiddhireti hi /
GP12brndp2_u:5678: ātrāsti kāraṇaṃ bhaktiḥ sāva vai trividhā matā // BndP_2,34.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5680: śivasya nāradasyāpi śukasya ca mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,34.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:5687: sevate gopikādhīśaṃ tena siddhiṃ na cāgataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5688: vasiṣṭha uvāca ityuktā tvaritaṃ kāntaṃ sā mṛgī hṛṣṭamānasā // BndP_2,34.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:5691: rhadṛg jñānaṃ tava kathaṃ saṃjātaṃ tadvadādhunā // BndP_2,34.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:5692: mṛga uvāca śṛṇu priye mahābhāge jñānaṃ puṇyena jāyate // BndP_2,34.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:5696: ato 'sya darśanājjātaṃ jñānaṃ me/dyaiva bhāmini // BndP_2,34.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:5701: yottamā bhaktirākhyātā tāṃ vinā naiva siddhyati /
GP12brndp2_u:5705: jñātvā ca lapsyate siddhiṃ mantrasya kavacasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:5710: tataḥ saṃsiddha kavacau rājanaṃ haihayādhipam // BndP_2,34.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:5712: triḥ saptakṛtvo nirbhūpāṃ kariṣyatyavanīṃ priya // BndP_2,34.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:5713: vasiṣṭha uvāca evamuktvā mṛgo rājanvirarāma mṛgīṃ tataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5714: ātmano mṛgabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ jñātavāṃśca ha // BndP_2,34.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:5715: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite catustriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 34//
GP12brndp2_u:5718: tvayāpi hi mahābhāga yataḥ śaṃsasi satkathāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5721: punaḥ prapaccha kiṃ nātha tanme vada savistaram // BndP_2,35.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5722: vasiṣṭha uvāca śṛṇu rājanpravakṣyāmi mṛgasya caritaṃ mahat /
GP12brndp2_u:5723: yathā pṛṣṭaṃ tayā so 'syai varṇayāmāsa tattvavit // BndP_2,35.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5724: śrutvā tu caritaṃ tasya bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5725: bhūyaḥ prapaccha taṃ kāntaṃ jñānatattvārthamādarāt // BndP_2,35.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5726: mṛgyuvāca sādhusādhu mahābhāga kṛtārthastvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5729: karmaṇā yena saṃprāptāvāvāṃ tiryagjaniṃ prabho // BndP_2,35.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:5730: iti vākyaṃ samākarṇya priyāyāḥ sa mṛgaḥ svayam /
GP12brndp2_u:5732: mṛga uvāca śṛṇu priye mahābhāge yathā'vāṃ mṛgatāṃ gatau /
GP12brndp2_u:5739: jyeṣṭho rāmo 'nujastasya dhamastasyānu jaḥ pṛthuḥ // BndP_2,35.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5747: ekadā tu vayaṃ sarve saṃprāptā parvate vane // BndP_2,35.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:5761: śṛṅgaiḥ samullikhantaṃ ca vyoma kautukasaṃ yutam // BndP_2,35.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5767: nirjharāpāta śirasi pātukāmā jalaṃ priye // BndP_2,35.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5769: tatra prāpto yadṛcchāto jagṛhe tāṃ bhayarditām // BndP_2,35.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:5772: sā mṛtā tvaṃ mṛgī jātā mṛga stvāhamanusmaran /
GP12brndp2_u:5773: jāto bhadre na jāne vai kva gātā bhrātaro 'grajāḥ // BndP_2,35.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:5775: bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca tathā śṛṇu bhadre vadāmyaham // BndP_2,35.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5777: rāmasyāsya bhayātso 'pi bhakṣito hariṇā dhunā // BndP_2,35.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:5779: avābhyāṃ tu jalaṃ pītaṃ madhyame puṣkare tviha // BndP_2,35.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:5783: gamiṣyāvaḥ śubhāṃllokānyeṣu gatvā na śocati // BndP_2,35.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:5789: snātvā nityakriyāṃ kṛtvā pratasthe harṣito bhṛśam // BndP_2,35.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5790: rāmeṇa gacchatā mārge dṛṣṭo vyādho mṛtastadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5793: snātvā mādhyāhnikīṃ sandhyāṃ cakā rātimudānvitaḥ // BndP_2,35.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:5794: hitaṃ tadātmanaḥ proktaṃ mṛgeṇa sa vicārayan /
GP12brndp2_u:5799: vipadgataṃ puṣkaraṃ tu paśyamāno mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,35.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:5809: tatra praviśya vai rāmo hyakṛtavraṇasaṃyutaḥ // BndP_2,35.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:5811: stimitodasaraḥ prakhyaṃ dhyāyantaṃ brahma śāśvatam // BndP_2,35.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:5813: nanāma ca mahārāja svābhidhānaṃ samuccaran // BndP_2,35.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:5816: ityuktavantaṃ rāmaṃ tu unmīlya nayane śanaiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5819: dadau papraccha kuśalaṃ tapasaśca kulasya ca // BndP_2,35.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:5820: sa pṛṣṭastena vai rāmo ghaṭodbhavamuvāca ha /
GP12brndp2_u:5822: kiṃ tvaṅkaṃ saṃśayaṃ jātaṃ chindhi svavacanāmṛtaiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5823: mṛgaścaiko mayā dṛṣṭo madhyame puṣkare vibho // BndP_2,35.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:5826: pāhi māṃ kṛpayā nātha sādhayanta mahāmanum /
GP12brndp2_u:5827: śivena dattaṃ kavaca mama sādhayato guro // BndP_2,35.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:5828: kṛṣmasya samatīta tu sādhikaṃ hi śaracchatam /
GP12brndp2_u:5829: na ca siddhimavāpto 'haṃ tanme tvaṃ kṛpayā vada // BndP_2,35.57 //
GP12brndp2_u:5830: vasiṣṭha uvāca evaṃ praśnaṃ samākarṇya rāmasya sumahātmanaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5831: kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā mahārāja mṛgoktaṃ jñātavān hṛdā // BndP_2,35.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:5832: mṛgaṃ cāpi samāyātaṃ mṛgyā saha nijāśrame /
GP12brndp2_u:5833: śrotuṃ kṛṣṇāmṛtaṃ stotraṃ sarvaṃ tatkāraṇa muniḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5835: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavaca rite pañcatriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 35//
GP12brndp2_u:5836: vasiṣṭha uvāca avagatya sa vai sarvaṃ kāraṇaṃ prītamānasaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5838: agastya uvāca śṛṇu rāma mahābhāga kathayāmi hitaṃ tava /
GP12brndp2_u:5839: mantrasya siddhiṃ yena tvaṃ śīghrameva samāpnuyāḥ // BndP_2,36.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:5841: yo yateta narastasya siddhirbhavati satvaram // BndP_2,36.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5843: pātālaṃ nāgarācaindraiḥ śobhitaṃ parayā mudā // BndP_2,36.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5844: tatra dṛṣṭā mahābhāga mayā siddhāḥ samantataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5847: ete 'nye ca mahāsiddhā vātsyāyanamukhā dvija // BndP_2,36.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5849: taṃ namaskṛtya nāgaindraiḥ saha siddhairmahātmabhiḥ // BndP_2,36.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:5852: niviṣṭā puratastasya śṛṇvantī tāḥ kathāḥ sadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5853: yadyatpṛcchati sā bhūmiḥ śeṣaṃ sākṣānmahīdharam // BndP_2,36.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:5855: mayā tatra śrutaṃ vatsa kṛṣṇapremāmṛtaṃ śubham // BndP_2,36.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5859: śrutvā sarvaṃ dharā vatsa pratdṛṣṭā taṃ dharādharam // BndP_2,36.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5861: dharaṇyuvāca alaṅkṛtaṃ janma puṃsāmapi nandavrajaukasām // BndP_2,36.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5865: tattāni brūhi nāmāni vāsudevasya vāsuke // BndP_2,36.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:5866: nātaḥ parataraṃ puṇyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate /
GP12brndp2_u:5867: śeṣa uvāca vasuṃdhare varārohe janānāmasti muktidam // BndP_2,36.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:5871: śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi nāmnāmaṣṭotaraṃ śatam // BndP_2,36.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:5873: ekāvṛttyā tu kṛṣṇasya nāmaikaṃ tatprayacchati // BndP_2,36.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:5919: kṛṣṇona kṛṣṇabhaktena śrutvā gītāmṛtaṃ purā // BndP_2,36.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:5923: dānaṃ vrataṃ tapastīrthaṃ yatkṛtaṃ tviha janmani // BndP_2,36.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:5927: śiśūnāṃ gokulānāṃ ca puṣṭidaṃ puṇyavarddhanam // BndP_2,36.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:5933: imaṃ mantraṃ mahādevi japanneva divā niśam // BndP_2,36.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:5937: agastya uvāca etāvadukto bhāgavānananto mūrttistu saṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñitā vibho //
GP12brndp2_u:5938: dharādharo 'laṃ jagatāṃ dharāyai nirdiśya bhūyo virarāma mānadaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5939: tatastu sarve sanakādayo ye samāsthitāstatparitaḥ kathādṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5942: dharādharāyāpi kṛpārṇavāya śeṣāya viśvaprabhave namaste // BndP_2,36.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:5943: kṛṣṇāmṛtaṃ naḥ paripāyitaṃ vibho vidhūtapāpā bhavatā kṛtā vayam /
GP12brndp2_u:5944: bhavādṛśā dīnadayālavo vibho samuddharantyeva nijānhi saṃnatān //
GP12brndp2_u:5951: yāvanti mantrajālāni stotrāṇi kavacāni ca // BndP_2,36.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:5953: vasiṣṭha uvāca evamuktvā mahārāja kṛṣṇapremāmṛtaṃ stavam /
GP12brndp2_u:5959: gatau ca vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ sarva devana maskṛtam /
GP12brndp2_u:5961: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite ṣaṭtriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 36//
GP12brndp2_u:5962: vasiṣṭha uvāca dṛṣṭvā paraśurāmastu tadāścaryaṃ mahādbhutam /
GP12brndp2_u:5965: modamāna uvācedaṃ bhārgavaṃ purataḥ sthitam // BndP_2,37.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:5966: agastya uvāca śṛṇu rāma mahābhāga kāryākārviśārada /
GP12brndp2_u:5967: hitaṃ vadāmi yatte 'dya tatkuruṣva samāhitaḥ // BndP_2,37.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5969: padāni yatra dṛśyante nyastāni sumāhātmanā // BndP_2,37.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5975: śatrūṇāṃ nigrahārthāya tacca te siddhidaṃ bhavet // BndP_2,37.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:5976: vasiṣṭha uvāca eva mukto hyagastyena rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5983: jagāma darśanaṃ tasya jāmadagnyasya bhūpate // BndP_2,37.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:5989: praṇamya daṇḍavadbhamau tuṣṭāva prayato vibhum // BndP_2,37.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:5990: paraśurām uvāca namo namaḥ kāraṇavigrahāya prapannapālāya surārttihāriṇe /
GP12brndp2_u:5993: taṃ tvāmanirdeśyamacaṃ purāmamanantamīḍe bhava me dayāparaḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:5994: yastveka īśo nijavāñcchitaprado dhatte tanūrlokavihāra rakṣaṇe /
GP12brndp2_u:5995: nānā vidhā devamanuṣyatiryagyādaḥ su bhūmerbharavāraṇāya // BndP_2,37.17
GP12brndp2_u:5998: yaṃ vai prasannā asurāḥ surā narāḥ sakinnarāstiryakeyonayo 'pi hi /
GP12brndp2_u:5999: gatāḥ svarūpaṃ nikhalaṃ vihāya te dehastryapatyārthamamatvamīśvara //
GP12brndp2_u:6000: taṃ devadevaṃ bhajatāmabhīpsitapradaṃ nirīhaṃ guṇavarjitaṃ ca /
GP12brndp2_u:6004: ye vai tvadīyaṃ caraṇaṃ bhavaśramānnirviṇmacittā vidhivatsmaranti /
GP12brndp2_u:6005: namanti bhaktyātha samarcayanti vai parasparaṃ saṃsadi varṇayanti //
GP12brndp2_u:6007: taranti cānyānapi tārayanti hi bhavauṣadhaṃ nāma sudhā taveśa //
GP12brndp2_u:6009: ārādhayaṃ nātha bhavānabhijñaḥ kiṃ te ha vijñāpyamihāsti loke //
GP12brndp2_u:6010: vasiṣṭha uvāca ityevaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ tu stuvantaṃ praṇataṃ puraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6012: kṛṣṇa uvāca hanta rāma mahābhāga siddhaṃ te kāryamuttamam /
GP12brndp2_u:6014: hatvā taṃ kārttavīryaṃ hi rājānaṃ dṛptamānasam /
GP12brndp2_u:6015: sādhayitvā piturvairaṃ kuru niḥkṣatriyāṃ mahīm // BndP_2,37.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:6017: kṛtakāryo dvijaśreṣṭa taṃ samāpaya mānada // BndP_2,37.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:6019: cariṣyati yathā kālaṃ karttā harttā svayaṃ prabhuḥ // BndP_2,37.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:6021: rāmo nāma bhaviṣyāmi caturvyūhaḥ sanātanaḥ // BndP_2,37.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:6023: tadā kauśikayajñaṃ tu sādhayitvā salakṣmaṇaḥ // BndP_2,37.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:6026: tadā yāsyannayodhyāṃ te hariṣye teja unmadam /
GP12brndp2_u:6027: vasiṣṭha uvāca kṛṣṇa evaṃ samadiśya jāmadagnyaṃ taponidhim /
GP12brndp2_u:6029: iti śrībrahāmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhargavacarite saptatriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 37//
GP12brndp2_u:6030: vasiṣṭha uvāca antarddhānaṃ gate kṛṣṇe rāmastu sumahāyaśāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6034: yatra pāpaharā puṇyā narmadā saritāṃ varā /
GP12brndp2_u:6035: punāti darśanādeva prāṇinaḥ pāpino hyapi // BndP_2,38.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:6037: tripurasya vināśāya kṛto yatno mahīpate // BndP_2,38.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:6038: tatra kiṃ varṇyate puṇyaṃ nṛṇāṃ devasvarūpiṇām /
GP12brndp2_u:6039: sadṛṣṭvā narmadāṃ bhūpa bhargavaḥ kulanandanaḥ // BndP_2,38.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:6042: kṣipraṃ nāśaya śatrūnme varadā bhava śobhane /
GP12brndp2_u:6043: ityevaṃ sa namaskṛtya narmadāṃ pāpanāśinīm // BndP_2,38.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:6045: dūta rājātvayā vācyo yadahaṃ vacmi te 'nagha // BndP_2,38.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:6046: na saṃdehastvayā kāryo dūtaḥ kvāpi na badhyate /
GP12brndp2_u:6047: yadbalaṃ tu samāśritya jamadagnimuniṃ nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,38.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:6049: śīghraṃ nirgaccha mandātmanyuddhaṃ rāmāya dehi tat // BndP_2,38.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:6050: bhārgavaṃ tvaṃ samāsādya gaccha lokāntaraṃ tvarā /
GP12brndp2_u:6051: ityevamuktvā rājānaṃ śrutvā tasya vacastathā // BndP_2,38.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:6052: śīghramāgaccha bhadraṃ te vilaṃbo neha śasyate /
GP12brndp2_u:6057: kārttavīrya uvāca mayā bhujabalenaiva dattadattena medinī // BndP_2,38.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:6059: tadbalaṃ mayi vartteta yuddhaṃ dāsye tavādhunā // BndP_2,38.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:6061: senādhyakṣaṃ samāhūya provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // BndP_2,38.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:6062: sajjaṃ kuru mahābhāga sainyaṃ me vīrasaṃmataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6063: yotsye rāmeṇa bhṛguṇā vilaṃbo mā bhavatviti // BndP_2,38.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:6065: sainyaṃ sajjaṃ vidhāyāśu caturaṅga nyavedayat // BndP_2,38.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:6066: sainyaṃ sajjaṃ samākarṇya kārttavīryo nṛpo mudā /
GP12brndp2_u:6083: yadā pracalitaṃ sainyaṃ kārttavīryārjunasya vai // BndP_2,38.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:6084: tadā prācchāditaṃ vyoma rajasā ca diśo daśa /
GP12brndp2_u:6087: mārge dadarśa rājendro viparītāni bhūpate // BndP_2,38.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:6089: muktakeśāṃ chinnanāsāṃ rudatīṃ ca digaṃbarām // BndP_2,38.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:6091: kucailaṃ patitaṃ bhagnaṃ nagnaṃ kāṣāyavāsasam // BndP_2,38.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:6093: godhāṃ ca śaśakaṃ śalyaṃ riktakumbhaṃ sarīmṛpam // BndP_2,38.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:6095: svadakṣiṇe śṛgālaṃ ca kurvantaṃ bhairvaṃ ravam // BndP_2,38.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:6096: rogiṇaṃ puṃlkasaṃ caiva vṛṣaṃ ca śyenabhallukau /
GP12brndp2_u:6097: dṛṣṭvāpi prayayau yoddhuṃ kālapāśāvṛto hajhāt // BndP_2,38.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:6106: dṛṣṭvā samudyataṃ rāmaṃ sainikānāṃ vadhāya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:6107: cakaṃpire bhṛśaṃ sarve mṛtyoriva śarīriṇaḥ // BndP_2,38.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:6108: sa yatra yatrānilaraṃhasaṃ bhṛguścikṣepa roṣeṇa yutaḥ paraśvadham /
GP12brndp2_u:6110: yathā gajendro madayuksamantato nālaṃ vanaṃ bharddayati pradhāvan /
GP12brndp2_u:6111: tathaiva rāmo 'pi manonilaujā vimarddayāmāsa nṛpasya senām // BndP_2,38.41
GP12brndp2_u:6112: dṛṣṭvā tamitthaṃ praharantamojasā rāmaṃ raṇe śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham /
GP12brndp2_u:6113: udyamya cāpaṃ mahadāsthito rathaṃ sṛjyaṃ ca kṛtvā kilamansyarājaḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:6115: dṛṣṭvā tamāyāntamatho mahātmā rāmo gṛhītvā dhanuṣaṃ mahogram //
GP12brndp2_u:6117: sa cāpi rājātibalo manasvī sasarja rāmāya tu parvatāstram // BndP_2,38.44
GP12brndp2_u:6119: rāmo 'pi tatrātibalaṃ viditvā taṃ matsyarājaṃ vividhāstrapūgaiḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:6121: nārāyaṇāstre bhṛguṇā prayukte rāmeṇa rājannṛpatervadhāya // BndP_2,38.46
GP12brndp2_u:6122: diśastu sarvāḥ subhṛśaṃ hi tejasā prajajvalurmatsyapatiścakaṃpe /
GP12brndp2_u:6123: rāmastu tasyātha vilakṣya kampaṃ bāṇaiścaturbhirnijaghāna vāhān //
GP12brndp2_u:6124: śareṇa caikena dhvajaṃ mahātmā ciccheda cāpaṃ ca śaradvayena /
GP12brndp2_u:6125: bāṇena caikena prasahya sārathiṃ nipātya bhūmau rathamārddayattribhiḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:6126: tyaktvā rathaṃ bhūmigataṃ ca maṅgalaṃ paraśvadhenāśu jaghāna mūrddhani /
GP12brndp2_u:6127: sa bhinnaśīrṣo rudhiraṃ vamanmuhurmarcchāmavāpyātha mamāra ca kṣaṇāt //
GP12brndp2_u:6131: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyama bhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite aṣṭātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 38//
GP12brndp2_u:6132: vasiṣṭha uvāca matsyarāje nipatite rājā yuddhaviśāradaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6141: tadastraṃ bhārgave dreṇa kṣiptaṃ saṃgrāmamūrddhani // BndP_2,39.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:6143: tataḥ kruddho mahābhāgo rāmaḥ śatruvidāraṇaḥ // BndP_2,39.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:6145: bṛhadbalaṃ ca gadayā vidarbhaṃ muṣṭinā tathā // BndP_2,39.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:6149: dudrāva kārttavīryaṃ ca jāmadagnyo mahābalaḥ // BndP_2,39.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:6151: kāryyākāryavidhānajñāḥ pṛṣṭe kṛtvā ca haihayam // BndP_2,39.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:6156: na cādṛśyata rājendra tadā sa tvakṛtavraṇaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6157: sasmāra rāmacaritaṃ yaduktaṃ hariṇena vai // BndP_2,39.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:6159: etasminneva kāle tu rāmaḥ śastrāstrakovidaḥ // BndP_2,39.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:6162: trirātraṃ samare rāmastaiḥ sārddhaṃ yuyudhe balī /
GP12brndp2_u:6171: teḥ prayuktāni śastrāṇi mahāstrāṇi ca bhūpate // BndP_2,39.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:6175: karṣakastu yathā kṣetre pakvaṃ dhānyaṃ tathā tṛṇam // BndP_2,39.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:6181: rāmo 'smai yāni śastrāṇi cikṣepāstrāṇi cāpi hi // BndP_2,39.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:6182: tāni sarvāṇi ciccheda sucandro yuddha paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6183: tataḥ kruddho raṇe rāmaḥ sucandraṃ pṛthivīśvaram // BndP_2,39.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:6187: hṛṣṭottīrya rathātsadyaḥ sucandraḥ praṇanāma ha // BndP_2,39.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:6189: tamevaṃ praṇataṃ tyaktvā yathau nārāyamantikam // BndP_2,39.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:6191: dṛṣṭvā vyarthaṃ mahāstraṃ tadbhūpaṃ svasthaṃ vilokya ca // BndP_2,39.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:6192: rāmaḥ śaktiṃ ca musalaṃ tomaraṃ paṭṭiśaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp2_u:6193: gadāṃ ca paraśuṃ kopācchikṣepa nṛpamūrddhani // BndP_2,39.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:6194: jagrāha tāni sarvāṇi sucandro līlayaiva hi /
GP12brndp2_u:6195: cikṣepa śivaśūlaṃ ca rāmo nṛpataye yadā // BndP_2,39.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:6197: dadarśa ca purastasya bhadrakālīṃ jagatprasūm // BndP_2,39.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:6199: siṃhasthāṃ ca trinetrāṃ ca triśūlavaradhāriṇīm // BndP_2,39.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:6201: rāma uvāca namostu te śaṅkaravallabhāyai jagatsavitryai samalaṅkṛtāyai //
GP12brndp2_u:6217: namo namaste parataḥ purastāt pārśvādharordhvaṃ ca namo namaste //
GP12brndp2_u:6218: sadā ca sarvatra namo namaste namo namaste 'khilavigrahāyai /
GP12brndp2_u:6219: prasīda deveśi mama pratijñāṃ purā kṛtāṃ pālaya bhadrakāli // BndP_2,39.44
GP12brndp2_u:6220: tvameva mātā ca pitā tvameva jagattrayasyāpi namo namaste /
GP12brndp2_u:6221: vasiṣṭha uvāca evaṃ stutā tadā devī bhadrakālī tarasvinī // BndP_2,39.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:6223: bhadrakālyuvāca vatsa rāma mahābhāga prītāsmi tava sāṃpratam // BndP_2,39.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:6224: varaṃ varaya matto yastvayā cābhyarthitā hṛdi /
GP12brndp2_u:6225: rāma uvāca mātaryadi varo deyastvayā me bhaktava tsale // BndP_2,39.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:6227: iti me 'bhihitaṃ devi kuru prītena cetasā // BndP_2,39.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:6229: bhadrakālyuvāca āgneyāstreṇa rājendraṃ sucandraṃ naya madgṛham // BndP_2,39.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:6231: vasiṣṭha uvāca ityuktamākarṇya sa bhārgavendro devyāḥ priyaṃ kartumathodyato 'bhūt //
GP12brndp2_u:6232: prāṇānniyamyācamanaṃ ca kṛtvā sucandramuddiśya ca tatsamādadhe /
GP12brndp2_u:6233: astraṃ prayuktaṃ nṛpatervadhāya rāmeṇa rājan prasabhaṃ tadā tat //
GP12brndp2_u:6234: dagdhvā vapurbhūtamayaṃ tadīyaṃ nināya lokaṃ paradevatāyāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6235: tatastu rāmeṇa kṛtapraṇāmā sā bhadrakālo jagadādikartrī // BndP_2,39.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:6237: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite ekonacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 39//
GP12brndp2_u:6238: vasiṣṭha uvāca sucandre patite rājan rājendrāṇāṃ śiromaṇau /
GP12brndp2_u:6246: dṛṣṭvā taṃ puṣkārākṣaṃ tu sucandratanayaṃ tadā /
GP12brndp2_u:6249: tato meghāḥ samutpannā garjanto bhairavānnavān // BndP_2,40.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:6252: tena te 'darśanaṃ nītāḥ sadya eva balāhakāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6253: atha rāmo bhṛśaṃ kruddho brāhmaṃ tatrābhisaṃdadhe // BndP_2,40.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:6255: brāhma so 'pyāhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā daṇḍāhata ivāragaḥ // BndP_2,40.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:6259: ekaikena ca bāṇena hṛdi śīrṣe bhujadvaye // BndP_2,40.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:6260: śikhāyāṃ ca kramādbhittvā tastaṃbha bhṛśa māturam /
GP12brndp2_u:6261: sa caivaṃ pīḍīto rāmaḥ puṣkarākṣeṇa saṃyuge // BndP_2,40.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:6264: patite śakale bhūmau tatkālaṃ paśyatā nṛṇām /
GP12brndp2_u:6265: āścaryaṃ sumāhajjātaṃ divi caiva divau kasām // BndP_2,40.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:6268: yato yato dhāvati bhārgavendro mano 'nilaujāḥ praharanparaśvadham /
GP12brndp2_u:6269: tatastato vājirathebhamānavā nikṛttagātrāḥ śataśo nipetuḥ // BndP_2,40.16
GP12brndp2_u:6270: rāmeṇa tatrā tibalena saṃgare nihanyamānāstu paraśvadhena /
GP12brndp2_u:6271: hā tāta mātastviti jalpamāṃnā bhasmībabhūvuḥ suvicūrṇitāstadā //
GP12brndp2_u:6272: muhūrttamātreṇa ca bhārgaveṇa tatpuṣkarākṣasya balaṃ samagram /
GP12brndp2_u:6281: senāḥ saṃvyūhya saṃtasthuḥ saṃgrāme piturājñayā // BndP_2,40.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:6285: jagrā ha bhārgavendrasya samare jetumudyataḥ // BndP_2,40.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:6287: yathā balāhako vīra parvatopari varṣati // BndP_2,40.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:6295: tato vyomni sadā sakte dve cāpya stre narādhipa // BndP_2,40.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:6297: trayo lokāḥ sapātālā dṛṣṭvā tanmahadadbhutam // BndP_2,40.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:6300: rakṣā vidheyādya mayāsya saṃyamo nivāraṇīyaḥ paramāṃśadhāriṇā /
GP12brndp2_u:6302: pītvātirāmaṃ jagadākalayya tasthau kṣaṇaṃ dhyānagato mahātmā /
GP12brndp2_u:6304: papāta bhūmau sahasātha tatkṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsvāsthyamupājagāma /
GP12brndp2_u:6305: sa jāmadagnyo mahātāṃ mahīyānsraṣṭuṃ tathā pālayituṃ nihantum //
GP12brndp2_u:6308: kalākalāpeṣu kṛtaprayatno vidyāsu śāstreṣu budho vidhijñaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6309: evaṃ nṛloke prathayansvabhāvaṃ sarvāṇi kalyāni karoti nityam //
GP12brndp2_u:6310: sarve tu lokā vijitāstu tena rāmeṇa rājanyaniṣūdanena /
GP12brndp2_u:6311: evaṃ sa rāmaḥ prathitaprabhāvaḥ praśāmayitvā tu tadastrayugmam //
GP12brndp2_u:6312: punaḥ pravṛtto nidhanaṃ prakartuṃ raṇāgaṇe haihayavaṃśaketoḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6313: tuṇīrataḥ patriyugaṃ gṛhītvā puṅkhe nidhāyātha dhanurjyakāyām //
GP12brndp2_u:6316: mene nijaṃ vīryamiha praṇaṣṭaṃ rāmeṇa bhūmīśatiraskṛtātmā /
GP12brndp2_u:6319: tataḥ sa rājā nijavīryavaibhavaṃ samastalokādhikatāṃ prayātam //
GP12brndp2_u:6323: yadāsya hṛdyeṣa mahānubhāvo dattaḥ prayāto na hi darśanaṃ tadā //
GP12brndp2_u:6325: sa dhyāyamāno 'pi na cājagāma datto manogocaramasya rājan // BndP_2,40.44
GP12brndp2_u:6327: evaṃ yadātrestanayo mahātmā dṛṣṭo na ca dhyānapathe nṛpeṇa // BndP_2,40.45
GP12brndp2_u:6328: tadātiduḥ khena vidūyamānaḥ śokena mohena yuto babhūva /
GP12brndp2_u:6329: taṃ śokamagnaṃ nṛpatiṃ mahātmā rāmo jagādākhilacittadarśī // BndP_2,40.46
GP12brndp2_u:6330: mā śokabhāvaṃ nṛpate prayāhi naivānuśocanti mahānubhāvāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6331: yaste varāyābhavamādisarge sa eva cāhaṃ taṃva sādanāya // BndP_2,40.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:6333: sarvo hi lokaḥ svakṛtaṃ bhunakti śubhāśubhaṃ daivakṛtaṃ vipāke //
GP12brndp2_u:6335: yatte supuṇyaṃ bahujanmasaṃcitaṃ teneha dattasya varārhapātram //
GP12brndp2_u:6336: jāto bhavānadya tu duṣkṛtasya phalaṃ prabhuṅkṣva tvamihārjitasya /
GP12brndp2_u:6337: gururvimatyāpakṛtastvayā me yatastataḥ karṇanikṛntanaṃ te // BndP_2,40.50
GP12brndp2_u:6338: kṛtaṃ mayā paśya harantamojasā cūḍāmaṇiṃ māmapatdṛtya te yaśaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6339: ityevamuktvā sa bhṛgurmahātmā niyojya bāṇaṃ ca vikṛṣya cāpam //
GP12brndp2_u:6340: cikṣepa rājñaḥ sa tu lāghavena cchittvā maṇiṃ rāmamamupājagāma /
GP12brndp2_u:6341: tadvīkṣya karmāsya muneḥ sutasya sa cārjuno haihayavaṃśadharttā //
GP12brndp2_u:6345: sa rāmo lāghavenaiva saṃprakṣiptānyanena ca // BndP_2,40.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:6352: jagrāha samare rājā bhārgavasya vadhāya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:6357: mūrcchāmavāpa rājendra papāta ca hariṃ smaran // BndP_2,40.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:6358: patite bhārgave tatra sarve devā bhayākulāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6361: bhārgavaṃ jīvayāmāsa saṃjīvanyā sa vidyayā // BndP_2,40.62 //
GP12brndp2_u:6362: rāmastu cetanāṃ prāpya dadarśa purataḥ surān /
GP12brndp2_u:6363: praṇanāma ca rājendra bhaktyā brahmādikāṃstu tān // BndP_2,40.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:6365: sa rāmo vāryuspṛśya jajāpa kavacaṃ tu tat // BndP_2,40.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:6367: smṛtvā pāśupataṃ cāstraṃ śivadattaṃ sa bhārgavaḥ // BndP_2,40.65 //
GP12brndp2_u:6371: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite kārttavīryavadho nāma catvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 40//
GP12brndp2_u:6372: vasiṣṭha uvāca dṛṣṭvā piturvadhaṃ ghoraṃ tatputrāste śataṃ tvarā /
GP12brndp2_u:6375: saṃgrāmaṃ tumulaṃ cakruḥ saṃrabdhāstu piturvadhāt // BndP_2,41.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:6377: paraśvadhaṃ samādāya yuyudhe taiśca saṃgare // BndP_2,41.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:6386: nṛtyannivācau virarāja rāmaḥ śataṃ punaste parito bhramantaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6387: rejuśca gopī gaṇamadhyasaṃsthaḥ kṛṣṇo yathā tāḥ parito bhramantyaḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:6388: tadā tu sarve druhiṇapradhānāḥ samāgatāḥ svasvavimānasaṃsthāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6390: yaḥ śastrapādādudatiṣṭhata dhvanir huṃkāragarbho divamaspṛśansa vai /
GP12brndp2_u:6392: krandanti śastraiḥ kṣatavikṣatāṅgā gāyanti yadvatkila gītavijñāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6393: evaṃ pravṛttaṃ nṛpayuddhamaṇḍalaṃ paśyanti devā bhṛśavismitākṣaḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:6396: ekaikaśastānnijaghāna vīrāñchataṃ tadā pañca tataḥ palāyitāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6399: pṛthaggatāste suparīpsavo nṛpā na ko 'pi kāṃsviddadṛśe bhṛśārttaḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:6400: rāmo 'pi hatvā nṛpacakramājau rājñaḥ sahāyarthamupāgataṃ ca /
GP12brndp2_u:6401: samanvito 'sāvakṛtavraṇena sasnau mudāgatya ca narmadāyām // BndP_2,41.15
GP12brndp2_u:6406: kṛtakāryo mudā yuktaḥ kailāsaṃ prāpya tatkṣaṇam /
GP12brndp2_u:6415: yatra saṃgītasaṃnādā śrūyante tatratatra ha // BndP_2,41.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:6417: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhārgavo rājanmudā paramayā yutaḥ // BndP_2,41.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:6418: yayau tadūrdhvaṃ śikharaṃ yatra śevaparaṃ gṛham /
GP12brndp2_u:6419: tato dadarśa rājendra snigdhacchāyaṃ mahāvaṭam // BndP_2,41.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:6425: mandāraṃ bhairavaṃ bāṇaṃ ruruṃ bhairavameva ca // BndP_2,41.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:6426: vīrakaṃ vīrabhadraṃ ca caṇḍaṃ bhṛṅgiṃ riṭiṃ mukham /
GP12brndp2_u:6434: dṛṣṭvā vāme kārttikeya dakṣa caiva vināyakam /
GP12brndp2_u:6439: vināyako mahārāja kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhetyuvāca ha // BndP_2,41.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:6445: rāma uvāca gatvā hyantaḥpuraṃ bhrātaḥ praṇamya jagadīśvarau // BndP_2,41.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:6448: anye sahasraśo bhūpāḥ kāṃbojāḥ paṅlavāḥ śākāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6451: tamimaṃ praṇipatyaiva yāsyāmi svagṛhaṃ prati // BndP_2,41.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:6453: provāca madhuraṃ vākyaṃ bhārgave sa gaṇādhipaḥ // BndP_2,41.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:6454: vināyaka uvāca jñaṇaṃ tiṣṭa mahābhāga darśanaṃ te bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:6455: adya viśveśvaro bhrātarbhavānyā saha varttate // BndP_2,41.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:6457: karoti sukhabhaṅgaṃ yo narakaṃ sa vrajeddhruvam // BndP_2,41.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:6458: viśeṣatastu pitaraṃ guruṃ vā bhūpatiṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6459: ra7syaṃ samupāsinaṃ na paśyediti niścayaḥ // BndP_2,41.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:6461: strīvicchedo bhavettasya dhruvaṃ saprasu janmasu // BndP_2,41.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:6462: śroṇiṃ vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ vaktraṃ yaḥ paśyati parastriyaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6463: māturvāpi bhaginyā vā duhituḥ sa narādhamaḥ // BndP_2,41.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:6464: bhārgava uvāca aho śrutamapūrvaṃ kiṃ vacanaṃ tava vaktrataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6467: nirvikārāsya ca śiśorna doṣaḥ kaścideva hi // BndP_2,41.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:6468: yāsyāmyantaḥ puraṃ bhrātastava kiṃ tiṣṭha bālaka /
GP12brndp2_u:6470: tatraiva mātā tātaśca tvayā nāma nirūpitau /
GP12brndp2_u:6471: jagatāṃ pitarau tau ca pārvatīparameśvarau // BndP_2,41.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:6475: dṛṣṭvā sakandastu saṃbhrānto bodhayāmāsa tau tadā // BndP_2,41.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:6479: taṃ dṛṣṭvā gajānano bhṛguvaraṃ krodhātkṣipantaṃ tvarā svātmārthaṃ paraśuṃ tadā nijakareṇoddhṛtya vegena tu /
GP12brndp2_u:6480: bhūrlokaṃ bhuvaḥ svarapi tasyordhvaṃ maharvaijanaṃ lokaṃ cāpi tapo 'tha
GP12brndp2_u:6482: tasyordhvaṃ ca vidarśayanbhṛguvaraṃ golokamīśātmajo niṣpātyādharalokasaptaka mapītthaṃ darśayāmāsa ca /
GP12brndp2_u:6483: uddhṛtyātha tato hi garbhasalile prakṣaptamātraṃ tvarā bhītaṃ prāṇaparipsumānayadatho tatraiva yatrāsthitaḥ // BndP_2,41.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:6484: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite ekacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 41//
GP12brndp2_u:6485: vasiṣṭha uvāca evaṃ saṃbhrāmito rāmo gaṇādhīśena bhūpate /

GP12brndp2_u:6491: sa tu dantaḥ kuṭhāreṇa vicchinno bhūtale 'patat /

GP12brndp2_u:6531: tha tatra gatā devī pārvatī tanayānvitā // BndP_2,42.24 //

GP12brndp2_u:6535: sā yadā nābhyanandattaṃ bhārgavaṃ praṇataṃ puraḥ // BndP_2,42.26 //

GP12brndp2_u:6543: vināyakaste tanayo mahātmā mahatāṃ mahān // BndP_2,42.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:6544: yaṃ kāmaḥ krodha udvego bhayaṃ nāviśate kadā /

GP12brndp2_u:6564: evaṃ tavāsya putrasya saṃti nāmāni pārvati /

GP12brndp2_u:6569: yātrāyāṃ ca vaṇijyādau yuddhe devārcane śubhe // BndP_2,42.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:6571: tasya sarvāṇi kāryāṇi siddhyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,42.44 //

GP12brndp2_u:6582: mama rūpaṃ samāsthāya viṣṇośca hṛdaye śivaḥ // BndP_2,42.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:6583: eṣa rāmo mahābhāge vaiṣṇavaḥ śaivatāṃ gataḥ /

GP12brndp2_u:6588: spṛṣṭamātre kapole tu kṣataṃ pūrttimudāgatam // BndP_2,42.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:6592: evaṃ tayostu satkāraṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmagaṇeśayoḥ // BndP_2,42.54 //

GP12brndp2_u:6595: svotsaṃge sthāpayāmāsa premṇā matkṛtya mānadaḥ // BndP_2,42.56 //

GP12brndp2_u:6612_1: virāṭ yannābhyaṃburuhodbhavena vidhinaikāntopadiṣṭena vai sṛṣṭaṃ sarvamidaṃ carācaramayaṃ viśvaṃ ca yadromasu brahmāṇḍāni

GP12brndp2_u:6613: pāyādyaḥ sa carācarasya jagato vyāpī vibhuḥ saccidānandābdhiḥ prakaṭasthito vilasati premāndhayā rādhayā /
GP12brndp2_u:6614: kṛṣṇaḥ pūrṇatamo mamopari dayāklinnāntaraḥ stātsadā yenāhaṃ sukṛtī bhavāmi ca bhavāmyānandalīnāntaraḥ vasiṣṭha uvāca stutvaivaṃ jāmadagnyastu virarāma ha tatparam /

GP12brndp2_u:6623: yogaśca sādanīyo vai śatrūṇāṃ nigrahastathā // BndP_2,43.15 //

GP12brndp2_u:6774: tanmṛtereva maraṇaṃ śrutvā mātuśca kevalam // BndP_2,46.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:6780: prayayau sahitaḥ sakhyā bhrātṝṇāṃ tu didṛkṣayā // BndP_2,46.5 //

GP12brndp2_u:6798: sahasāhotha sārathyaṃ cakre sārathināṃ varaḥ // BndP_2,46.14 //

GP12brndp2_u:6810: jaghāna yatra saṃkruddho rājñāṃ śatamudāradhīḥ // BndP_2,46.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:6815: evaṃ vidrāvya sainyāni hatvā jitvātha saṃyuge /
GP12brndp2_u:6823: astrāgninā purīṃ sarvāṃ dagdhvā hatvā ca śātravān /
GP12brndp2_u:6836: jaghāna bhūmau niḥśeṣaṃ sākṣātkāla ivāntakaḥ // BndP_2,46.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:6839: alaṃ rāmeṇa rājendra smaratā nidhanaṃ pituḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6840: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī tena niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā // BndP_2,46.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:6843: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite ṣaṭcatvāriṃśatta mo 'dhyāyaḥ // 46//
GP12brndp2_u:6847: sa jagāma mahātejāḥ kurukṣetraṃ tapomayam // BndP_2,47.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:6851: sarāṃsi tāni vai pañca pūrayāmāsa bhārgavaḥ // BndP_2,47.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:6855: brāhmaṇaiḥ saha mātuśca tatra cakre yathoditam // BndP_2,47.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:6861: yatra yakre bhṛguśreṣṭhaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tṛptimakṣayām // BndP_2,47.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:6865: samantapañcakaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ loke pariśrutam // BndP_2,47.11 //
