GP12brndp2_u:10430: tamahaṃ te prayacchāmi tatra kuryā yathākramam // BndP_2,71.232 //
GP12brndp2_u:10431: na tvidānīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ tvaṃ varttethā bhūridakṣiṇa /
GP12brndp2_u:10432: sarvānapyatha vā garbhānpṛthaṅneṣyāmi te vaśam // BndP_2,71.233 //
GP12brndp2_u:10433: evaṃ mithyā naraśreṣṭha vāgeṣā na bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:10434: evamukto 'nunītaḥ sa jagrāha vacanaṃ tadā // BndP_2,71.234 //
GP12brndp2_u:10437: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ ka eṣa vasudevastu devakī ca yaśasvinī /
GP12brndp2_u:10438: nandagopastu kastveṣa yaśodā ya mahāyaśāḥ // BndP_2,71.236 //
GP12brndp2_u:10439: yo viṣṇuṃ janayāmāsa yaṃ ca tātetyabhāṣata /
GP12brndp2_u:10440: yā garbhaṃ janayāmāsa yā vainaṃ yābhyavarddhayat // BndP_2,71.237 //
GP12brndp2_u:10441: sūta uvāca puruṣaḥ kaśyapastvāsī daditistatpriyā tathā /
GP12brndp2_u:10443: nando droṇaḥ samākhyāto yaśodā ca dharābhavat /
GP12brndp2_u:10445: acaratsa mahīṃ devaḥ praviṣṭo mānuṣīṃ tanum /
GP12brndp2_u:10447: naṣṭe dharme tadā jajñe viṣṇurvṛṣṇikule svayam /
GP12brndp2_u:10451: śaibyā dhanyāni devīnāṃ sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa /
GP12brndp2_u:10452: caturdaśa tu ye proktā gaṇāstvapsarasāṃ divi // BndP_2,71.243 //
GP12brndp2_u:10458: cāruvidyaśca rukmiṇyāṃ kanyā cārumatī tathā // BndP_2,71.246 //
GP12brndp2_u:10462: bhānuḥ saubharikā caiva tāmraparṇī jarandharaḥ // BndP_2,71.248 //
GP12brndp2_u:10466: saṃbodhanī ca vikhyātā jñeyā jāṃbavatīsutāḥ // BndP_2,71.250 //
GP12brndp2_u:10468: ete putrāḥ sudevyāṃ ca viṣvaksenasya kīrttitāḥ // BndP_2,71.251 //
GP12brndp2_u:10472: prayutaṃ tu samākhyātaṃ vāsudevasya ye sutāḥ // BndP_2,71.253 //
GP12brndp2_u:10473: ayu tāni yathāṣṭau ca śūrā raṇaviśāradāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10474: janārdanasya vaṃśo vaḥ kīrtito 'yaṃ yathātatham // BndP_2,71.254 //
GP12brndp2_u:10476: kanyā sā bṛhadukthasya śaineyasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,71.255 //
GP12brndp2_u:10478: ānandaḥ kanakaḥ śvetaḥ kanyā śvetā tathaiva ca // BndP_2,71.256 //
GP12brndp2_u:10480: citrasenaḥ smṛtaścāsya kanyā citravatī tathā // BndP_2,71.257 //
GP12brndp2_u:10482: upāsaṃgasutau dvau tu vajrāraḥ kṣipra eva ca // BndP_2,71.258 //
GP12brndp2_u:10486: satyaprakṛtayo devāḥ pañca vīrāḥ prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_2,71.260 //
GP12brndp2_u:10488: sarvameva kulaṃ yacca varttante caiva ye kule // BndP_2,71.261 //
GP12brndp2_u:10489: viṣṇusteṣāṃ pramāṇe ca prabhutve ca vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10492: ihotpannā manuṣyeṣu bādhante te tu mānavān // BndP_2,71.263 //
GP12brndp2_u:10497: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapade vṛṣṇivaṃśānukīrttanaṃ nāmaikasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 71//
GP12brndp2_u:10499: saṃkarṣaṇo vāsudevaḥ pradyumnaḥ sāṃba eva ca // BndP_2,72.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:10504: ādideva stadā viṣṇurebhiśca saha daivataiḥ // BndP_2,72.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:10505: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ viṣṇuḥ kimarthaṃ saṃbhūtaḥ smṛtāḥ saṃbhūtayaḥ kati /
GP12brndp2_u:10506: bhaviṣyāḥ kati cānye ca prādurbhāvā mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,72.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:10508: punaḥ punarmanuṣyeṣu tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // BndP_2,72.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:10511: karmaṇāmānupūrvīṃ ca prādurbhāvāśca ye prabho // BndP_2,72.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:10520: mānuṣye sa kathaṃ buddhiṃ cakre cakrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10521: gopāyana yaḥ kurute jagataḥ sarvakālikam // BndP_2,72.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:10523: mahābhūtāni bhūtātmā yo dadhāra cakāra ha // BndP_2,72.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:10524: śrīgarbhaḥ sa kathaṃ garbhe striyā bhūcarayā vṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10527: dadau jitāṃ vasumatīṃ surāṇāṃ surasattamaḥ // BndP_2,72.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:10528: yena saiṃhaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā dvidhākṛtvā ca tatpunaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10530: yaḥ purā hyanalo bhūtvā tvaurvaḥ saṃvarttako vibhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10533: sahasraśirasaṃ devaṃ yamāhurvai yuge yuge // BndP_2,72.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:10536: yena te nihatā daityāḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye /
GP12brndp2_u:10540: yaḥ śeteśaśvataṃ yogamācchādya timiraṃ mahat // BndP_2,72.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:10542: śakraṃ ca yo daityagaṇaṃ ca rūddhaṃ garbhāvamānena bhṛśaṃ cakāra ha //
GP12brndp2_u:10543: padāni yo lokapadāni kṛtvā cakāra daityānsalileśayāṃstān /
GP12brndp2_u:10544: kṛtvā ca devāṃstridivasya devāṃścakre sureśaṃ puruhūtameva // BndP_2,72.23
GP12brndp2_u:10546: agnimāhavanīyaṃ ca vedīṃ caiva kuśaṃ sruvam /
GP12brndp2_u:10547: prokṣaṇīyaṃ śrutaṃ caiva āvabhṛthyaṃ tathaiva ca // BndP_2,72.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:10550: bhogārthaṃ yajñavidhinā yo yajño yajñakarmaṇi // BndP_2,72.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:10552: yajñiyāni ca dravyāṇi yajñiyāṃśca tathānalān // BndP_2,72.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:10556: kṣaṇā nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāśca kalāstraikālyameva ca // BndP_2,72.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:10558: ṛtavaḥ kālayogāśca pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ triṣu // BndP_2,72.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:10560: medhāvitvaṃ ca śauryaṃ ca śāstrasyeva ca pāraṇam // BndP_2,72.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:10562: traikālyaṃ trīṇi karmāṇi tisro mātrā guṇāstrayaḥ // BndP_2,72.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:10563: sṛṣṭā lokeśvarāścaiva yena yena ca karmaṇā /
GP12brndp2_u:10565: kṣaṇaṃ saṃdhāya pūrveṇa yogena ramate ca yaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10566: gatāgatānāṃ yo netā sarvatra vividheśvaraḥ // BndP_2,72.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:10572: yaḥ paraṃ śruyate devo yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate tapaḥ // BndP_2,72.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:10573: yaḥ paraṃ tamasaḥ prāhuryaḥ paraṃ paramātmavān /
GP12brndp2_u:10574: ādityādistu yo devo yaśca daityāntako vibhuḥ // BndP_2,72.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:10576: seturyo lokasetūnāṃ medho yo madhyakarmaṇām // BndP_2,72.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:10588: tatrāpāṃ prathamāvāpaḥ sa saumyo rāśirucyate // BndP_2,72.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:10592: kaphavarge bhavecchukraṃ pittavarge ca śoṇitam // BndP_2,72.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:10593: kaphasya tdṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ nābhyāṃ pittaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12brndp2_u:10594: dehasya madhye tdṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ tu manasaḥ smṛtam // BndP_2,72.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:10595: nābhiścodara saṃsthā tu tatra devo hutāśanaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10596: manaḥ prajāpatirjñeyaḥ kaphaḥ somo vibhāvyate // BndP_2,72.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:10598: evaṃ pravarttite garbhe vṛtte karkandhusaṃnibhe // BndP_2,72.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:10600: sa pañcadhā śarīrastho vidyate varddhayetpunaḥ // BndP_2,72.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:10601: prāṇāpānau samānaśca hyudāno vyāna eva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:10604: vyāno vyānīyate yena samānaḥ sarvasaṃdhiṣu // BndP_2,72.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:10608: pārthivaṃ dehamāhustu prāṇātmānaṃ ca mārutam // BndP_2,72.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:10614: eṣa naḥ saṃśayo dhīmanneṣa vai vismayo mahān // BndP_2,72.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:10616: śrotumicchāmahe viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi ca yathākramam // BndP_2,72.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:10622: sūta uvāca ahaṃ vaḥ kīrttayiṣyāmi prādurbhāvaṃ mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,72.62 //
GP12brndp2_u:10626: tasya divyāṃ tanuṃ viṣṇorgadato me nibodhata // BndP_2,72.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:10627: yugadharme parāvṛtte kāle ca śithile prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10632: sūta uvāca devāsuraṃ yathāvṛttaṃ bruvatastannibodhata // BndP_2,72.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:10636: yugākhyā daśa saṃpūrṇā hyāsīdavyāhataṃ jagat // BndP_2,72.69 //
GP12brndp2_u:10638: baddhe balau vivādo 'tha saṃpravṛttaḥ sudāruṇaḥ // BndP_2,72.70 //
GP12brndp2_u:10639: devāsurāṇāṃ ca tadā ghoraḥ kṣayakaro mahān /
GP12brndp2_u:10640: teṣāṃ dvīpanimittaṃ vai saṃgrāmā bahavo 'bhaven // BndP_2,72.71 //
GP12brndp2_u:10648: vārtraśca daśamo ghorastato hālāhalaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_2,72.75 //
GP12brndp2_u:10652: hiraṇyākṣo hato dvandve prativāde ca daivate // BndP_2,72.77 //
GP12brndp2_u:10654: daṃṣṭrayā tu varāheṇa sa daityastu dvidhākṛtaḥ // BndP_2,72.78 //
GP12brndp2_u:10659: sa jaṃbho nihataḥ ṣaṣṭhe śakrāviṣṭena viṣṇunā /
GP12brndp2_u:10661: nihatā dānavāḥ sarve tripure tryaṃbakeṇa tu /
GP12brndp2_u:10666: hato dhvaje mahendreṇa mayāchatraśca yogavit // BndP_2,72.84 //
GP12brndp2_u:10672: ete devāsurā vṛttāḥ saṃgrāmā dvādaśaiva tu // BndP_2,72.87 //
GP12brndp2_u:10678: ṣaṣṭiścaiva sahasrāṇi triṃśacca niyutāni ca // BndP_2,72.90 //
GP12brndp2_u:10683: aśapattu tataḥ śukro rāṣṭraṃ daśayugaṃ punaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10688: yajñe devānatha gate kāvyaṃ te hyasurāṃ bruvan // BndP_2,72.95 //
GP12brndp2_u:10689: kiṃ tanno miṣatāṃ rāṣṭraṃ tyaktvā yajñaḥ surāngataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10690: sthātuṃ na śakrumo hyadya praviśāma rasātalam // BndP_2,72.96 //
GP12brndp2_u:10692: mābhaiṣṭa dhārayiṣyāmi tejasā svena vaḥ surāḥ // BndP_2,72.97 //
GP12brndp2_u:10694: kṛtsnāni hyapi tiṣṭhantu pāpasteṣāṃ sureṣu vai // BndP_2,72.98 //
GP12brndp2_u:10698: eṣa kāvya idaṃ sarvaṃ vyāvarttayati no balāt // BndP_2,72.100 //
GP12brndp2_u:10700: prasahya hatvā śiṣṭāṃstu pātālaṃ prāpayāmahe // BndP_2,72.101 //
GP12brndp2_u:10708: balirbaddho hato jaṃbho nihataśca virocanaḥ // BndP_2,72.105 //
GP12brndp2_u:10711: kiñcicchiṣṭāstu vai yūyaṃ yuddhe svalpe tu vai svayam /
GP12brndp2_u:10712: nītiṃ vo hi vidhāsyāmi kālaḥ kaścitpratīkṣyatām // BndP_2,72.107 //
GP12brndp2_u:10718: na vai devā vādhiṣyanti yāvadāgamanaṃ mama // BndP_2,72.110 //
GP12brndp2_u:10720: yotsyāmahe punardevāṃstataḥ prāpsyatha vai jayam // BndP_2,72.111 //
GP12brndp2_u:10722: nyastaśastrā vayaṃ sarve lokānyūyaṃ kramantu vai // BndP_2,72.112 //
GP12brndp2_u:10724: prahlādasya vacaḥ śrutvā satyānuvyātdṛtaṃ tu tat // BndP_2,72.113 //
GP12brndp2_u:10725: tato devā nyavarttanta vijvarā muditāśca ha /
GP12brndp2_u:10730: sa saṃdiśyasurānkāvyo mahodevaṃ prapadya ca // BndP_2,72.116 //
GP12brndp2_u:10732: mantrānicchāmi he deva ye na saṃti bṛhaspatau // BndP_2,72.117 //
GP12brndp2_u:10737: yadi pāsyati bhadraṃ te matto mantramavāpsyasi /
GP12brndp2_u:10738: tathokto devadevena sa śukrastu mahātapāḥ // BndP_2,72.120 //
GP12brndp2_u:10740: vrataṃ carāmyahaṃ deva yathoddiṣṭo 'smi vaiprabho // BndP_2,72.121 //
GP12brndp2_u:10742: asurāṇāṃ hitārthāya tasmiñchukre gate tadā // BndP_2,72.122 //
GP12brndp2_u:10743: mantrārthaṃ tatra vasati brahma caryaṃ maheśvare /
GP12brndp2_u:10744: tadbuddhvā nītipūrvaṃ tu rāṣṭraṃ nyastaṃ tadāsuraiḥ // BndP_2,72.123 //
GP12brndp2_u:10748: utpetuḥ sahasā sarve saṃtrastāste tato 'bhavan // BndP_2,72.125 //
GP12brndp2_u:10753: raṇe vijetuṃ devānvai na śakṣyāmaḥ kathañcana /
GP12brndp2_u:10756: dattaṃ teṣāṃ tu bhītānāṃ daityānāmabhayārthinām // BndP_2,72.129 //
GP12brndp2_u:10762: tataḥ saṃstaṃbhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śakraṃ devāstu mūḍhavat // BndP_2,72.132 //
GP12brndp2_u:10763: vyadravanta tato bhītā dṛṣṭvā śakraṃ vaśīkṛtam /
GP12brndp2_u:10765: māṃ tvaṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te neṣyāmi tvāṃ sureśvara /
GP12brndp2_u:10767: viṣmunā rakṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā devī kruddhā vaco 'vadat /
GP12brndp2_u:10768: eṣā tvāṃ viṣṇunā sārddha dahāmi maghavanbalāt // BndP_2,72.135 //
GP12brndp2_u:10772: indro 'bravījjahi hyenāṃ yāvanno na dahe dvibho // BndP_2,72.137 //
GP12brndp2_u:10774: tataḥ samīkṣya tāṃ viṣṇuḥ strīvadhaṃ karttumāsthitaḥ // BndP_2,72.138 //
GP12brndp2_u:10777: tridhā viṣṇustato devaḥ krūraṃ buddhvā cikīrṣitam /
GP12brndp2_u:10779: taṃ dṛṣṭvā strīvadhaṃ ghoraṃ cukopa bhṛgurīśvaraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:10782: tasmāttvaṃ saptakṛtvo vai manuṣyeṣu prapadyase // BndP_2,72.142 //
GP12brndp2_u:10785: anuvyāhṛtya viṣmuṃ sa tadādāya śiraḥ svayam /
GP12brndp2_u:10787: etāṃ tvāṃ viṣṇunā satyaṃ hatāṃ saṃjīvayāmyaham /
GP12brndp2_u:10788: yadi kṛtsno mayā dharmaścarito jñāyate 'pi vā // BndP_2,72.145 //
GP12brndp2_u:10789: tena satyena jīvasva yadi satyaṃ bravīmyaham /
GP12brndp2_u:10794: dṛṣṭvā saṃjīvitāmevaṃ devīṃ tāṃ bhṛguṇā tadā // BndP_2,72.148 //
GP12brndp2_u:10796: asaṃbhrāntena bhṛguṇā patnī saṃjīvitāṃ tataḥ // BndP_2,72.149 //
GP12brndp2_u:10797: dṛṣṭvā śakro na lebhe 'tha śarma kāvyabhayāttataḥ /

GP12brndp2_u:11229: śaśāpa taṃ tadā kruddha evamukto bṛhaspatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11237: tasya bhrātā pitṛvyastu cakāra bhavanaṃ tadā /
GP12brndp2_u:11238: tasminhi tatra vasati yadṛcchābhyāgato vṛṣaḥ // BndP_2,74.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:11240: jagrāha taṃ dīrgha tamā visphurantaṃ tu śṛṅgayoḥ // BndP_2,74.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:11241: sa tena nigṛhītastu na cacāla padātpadam /
GP12brndp2_u:11242: tato 'bravīd vṛṣastaṃ vai suṃca māṃ balināṃ vara // BndP_2,74.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:11244: tryaṃbakaṃ vahatā devaṃ yato jāto 'smi bhūtale // BndP_2,74.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:11245: suṃca māṃ balināṃ śreṣṭha pratisnehaṃ varaṃ vṛṇu /
GP12brndp2_u:11246: evamukto 'bravīdenaṃ jīvaṃstvaṃ me kva yāsyasi // BndP_2,74.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:11247: tena tvāhaṃ na mokṣyāmi parasvādaṃ catuṣpadam /
GP12brndp2_u:11248: tatastaṃ dīrghatamasaṃ sa vṛṣaḥ pratyuvāca ha // BndP_2,74.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:11249: nāsmākaṃ vidyate tāta pātakaṃ steyameva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:11250: bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ na jānīmaḥ peyāpeyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // BndP_2,74.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:11251: kāryā kāryaṃ ca vai vipra gamyagamyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:11252: na pāpmāno vayaṃ vipra dharmo hyeṣa gavāṃ śrutaḥ // BndP_2,74.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:11253: gavāṃ nāma sa ve śrutvā saṃbhrāntasta mamuñcata /
GP12brndp2_u:11254: bhaktyā cānuśravikayā gosutaṃ vai prasādayan // BndP_2,74.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:11260: godharma vai balaṃ kṛtvā snuṣāṃ sa hyabhyamanyata // BndP_2,74.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:11261: viparyayaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaradvānpravicintya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:11262: bhaviṣyamarthaṃ jñātvā ca mahātmā tvavamatya tam // BndP_2,74.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:11265: durvṛttaṃ tvāṃ tyajāmyeṣa gaccha tvaṃ svena karmaṇā /
GP12brndp2_u:11267: tenāsi tvaṃ parityakto durācāro 'si me mataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11268: sūta uvāca karmaṇyasmiṃstataḥ krūre tasya buddhirajāyata // BndP_2,74.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:11269: nirbhartsya caiva bahuśo bāhubhyāṃ parigṛhya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:11270: koṣṭe samudre prakṣipya gaṅgāṃbhasi samutsṛjat // BndP_2,74.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:11272: taṃ sastrīko balirnāma rājā dharmārthatattvavit // BndP_2,74.65 //
GP12brndp2_u:11274: taṃ gṛhītvā sa dharmātmā balirvairocanastadā // BndP_2,74.66 //
GP12brndp2_u:11276: prītaḥ sa vai vareṇātha cchandayāmāsa vai balim // BndP_2,74.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:11277: sa ca tasmādvaraṃ vavre putrārthī dānavarṣabhaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11278: baliruvāca saṃtānārthaṃ mahābhāga bhāryāyāṃ mama mānada // BndP_2,74.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:11281: sudeṣṇāṃ nāma bhāryāṃ svāṃ rājāsmai prāhiṇottadā /
GP12brndp2_u:11282: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā na sā devī jagāma ha // BndP_2,74.70 //
GP12brndp2_u:11283: svāṃ ca dhātreyikāṃ tasmai bhūṣayitvā vyasarjayat /
GP12brndp2_u:11286: kakṣīvaccakṣuṣau tau tu dṛṣṭvā rājā balistadā // BndP_2,74.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:11290: netyuvāca tatastaṃ tu mamaitāviti cābravīt // BndP_2,74.74 //
GP12brndp2_u:11292: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca māṃ matvā sudeṣṇā mahiṣī tava // BndP_2,74.75 //
GP12brndp2_u:11295: balirbhāryāṃ sudeṣṇā ca bhartsayāmāsa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11297: tāṃ sa dīrghatamā devīmabravīdyadi māṃ śubhe /
GP12brndp2_u:11298: dadhnā lavaṇamiśreṇa svabhyaktaṃ nagnakaṃ tathā // BndP_2,74.78 //
GP12brndp2_u:11300: tatastvaṃ prāpsyase devi putrāṃśca manasepsitān // BndP_2,74.79 //
GP12brndp2_u:11301: tasya sā tadvaco devī sarvaṃ kṛtavatī tathā /
GP12brndp2_u:11302: apānaṃ ca samāsādya jugupsaṃtī hyavarjayat // BndP_2,74.80 //
GP12brndp2_u:11304: vināpānaṃ kumāraṃ tvaṃ janayiṣyasi pūrvajam // BndP_2,74.81 //
GP12brndp2_u:11305: tatastaṃ dīrghatamasaṃ sā devī pratyuvāca ha //
GP12brndp2_u:11306: nārhasi tvaṃ mahābhāga putraṃ dātuṃ mamedṛśam // BndP_2,74.82 //
GP12brndp2_u:11307: ṛṣiruvāca tavāparadho devyeṣa nānyathā bhavitā tu vai /
GP12brndp2_u:11308: devīdṛśaṃ ca te pautramahaṃ dāsyāmi suprate // BndP_2,74.83 //
GP12brndp2_u:11310: tāṃ sa dīrghatamāścaiva kukṣau spṛṣṭvadamabravīt // BndP_2,74.84 //
GP12brndp2_u:11312: tena te pūrito garbhaḥ paurṇamāsyāmivodadhiḥ // BndP_2,74.85 //
GP12brndp2_u:11318: ityete dīrghatamasā balerdattāḥ sutāḥ purā // BndP_2,74.88 //
GP12brndp2_u:11321: tato manuṣyayonyāṃ vai janayāmāsa sa prajāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11324: bhaktyā cānanyayāsmāsu mune prītāsmi tena te // BndP_2,74.91 //
GP12brndp2_u:11325: tasmāttava tamo dīrghaṃ nistadāmyadya paśya vai /
GP12brndp2_u:11326: bārhaspatyaṃ ca yatte 'nyatpāpaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate tanau // BndP_2,74.92 //
GP12brndp2_u:11330: gavā hṛtatamāḥ so 'tha gautamaḥ samapadyata // BndP_2,74.94 //
GP12brndp2_u:11331: kakṣīvāṃstu tato gatvā saha pitrā girivrajam /
GP12brndp2_u:11332: yathoddiṣṭaṃ hi pitrātha cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // BndP_2,74.95 //
GP12brndp2_u:11333: tataḥ kālena mahatā tapasā bhāvitaḥ sa vai /
GP12brndp2_u:11336: suputreṇa tvayā tāta kṛtārthaśca yaśasvinā // BndP_2,74.97 //
GP12brndp2_u:11339: kūṣmāṇḍā gautamāste vai smṛtāḥ kakṣīvataḥ sutāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11343: kṛtārthaḥ so 'pi yogātmā yogamāśritya ca prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11349: ete ekṣvākavaḥ proktā bhavitāraḥ kalau yuge /
GP12brndp2_u:11354: sumitraṃ prāpya rājānaṃ saṃsthāṃ prāpsyati vai kalau // BndP_2,74.106 //
GP12brndp2_u:11356: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi magadho yo bṛhadrathaḥ // BndP_2,74.107 //
GP12brndp2_u:11358: atītā varttamānāśca bhaviṣyāśca tathā punaḥ // BndP_2,74.108 //
GP12brndp2_u:11362: pañcāśataṃ tathāṣṭau ca samā rājyamakārayat // BndP_2,74.110 //
GP12brndp2_u:11365: samāḥ śataṃ nirāmitro mahīṃ bhuktvā divaṃ gataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11366: pañcāśataṃ samāḥ ṣaṭ ca sukṣatraḥ prāptavānmahīm // BndP_2,74.112 //
GP12brndp2_u:11368: senājitsāṃprataṃ cāpi etā vai bhokṣyate samāḥ // BndP_2,74.113 //
GP12brndp2_u:11372: aṣṭapañjāśataṃ jābdānrājye sthāsyati vai śuciḥ // BndP_2,74.115 //
GP12brndp2_u:11374: suvratastu catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ rājyaṃ prāpsyati vīryavān // BndP_2,74.116 //
GP12brndp2_u:11380: catvāriṃśatsamā rājā sunetro bhokṣyate tataḥ // BndP_2,74.119 //
GP12brndp2_u:11384: dvāviṃśacca nṛpā hyete bhavitāro bṛhadrathāḥ // BndP_2,74.121 //
GP12brndp2_u:11385: pūrmaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vai teṣāṃ rājyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11388: miṣatāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hi pradyotiṃ nṛpatiṃ balāt // BndP_2,74.123 //
GP12brndp2_u:11390: trayoviṃśatsamā rājā bhavitā sa narottamaḥ // BndP_2,74.124 //
GP12brndp2_u:11392: viśākhayūpo bhavitā nṛpaḥ pañcāśataṃ samāḥ // BndP_2,74.125 //
GP12brndp2_u:11395: aṣṭatriṃśacchataṃ bhāvyāḥ prādyotāḥ pañca te nṛpāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11396: hatvā teṣāṃ yaśaḥ kṛtsnaṃ śiśunāgo bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.127 //
GP12brndp2_u:11400: tatastu viṃśatiṃ rājā kṣemadharmā bhavaṣyati // BndP_2,74.129 //
GP12brndp2_u:11406: sa vai puravaraṃ rājā vṛthivyāṃ kusumāhvayam // BndP_2,74.132 //
GP12brndp2_u:11408: catvāriśatsamā bhāvyo rājā vai nandivarddhanaḥ // BndP_2,74.133 //
GP12brndp2_u:11412: etaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhaviṣyanti tāvatkālaṃ nṛpāḥ pare // BndP_2,74.135 //
GP12brndp2_u:11418: tulyakālaṃ bhaviṣyanti sarvaṃ eva mahīkṣitaḥ // BndP_2,74.138 //
GP12brndp2_u:11422: ekarāṭ sa mahāpadma ekaccatro bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.140 //
GP12brndp2_u:11424: sarvakṣatraṃ samuddhṛtya bhāvinor'thasya vai balāt // BndP_2,74.141 //
GP12brndp2_u:11426: mahāpadmasya paryāye bhaviṣyanti nṛpāḥ kramāt // BndP_2,74.142 //
GP12brndp2_u:11428: bhuktvā mahīṃ varṣaśataṃ naredraḥ sa bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.143 //
GP12brndp2_u:11432: ṣaṭtriṃśattu samā rājā aśokānāṃ ca tṛptidaḥ // BndP_2,74.145 //
GP12brndp2_u:11434: kuśālasūnuraṣṭau ca bhoktā vai bandhupālitaḥ // BndP_2,74.146 //
GP12brndp2_u:11436: bhavitā sapta varṣāṇi devavarmā narādhipaḥ // BndP_2,74.147 //
GP12brndp2_u:11438: bṛhadrathaśca varṣāṇi sapta vai bhavitā nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,74.148 //
GP12brndp2_u:11439: ityete nava mauryā vai bhokṣyanti ca vasuṃdharām /
GP12brndp2_u:11440: saptatriṃśacchataṃ pūrṇaṃ tebhyaḥ śuṅgo gamiṣyati // BndP_2,74.149 //
GP12brndp2_u:11442: kārayiṣyati vai rājyaṃ samāḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ sa caiva tu // BndP_2,74.150 //
GP12brndp2_u:11444: bhavitā cāpi sujyeṣṭaḥ sapta varṣāṇi vai tataḥ // BndP_2,74.151 //
GP12brndp2_u:11446: tato bhadraḥ same dve tu bhaviṣyati nṛpaśca vai // BndP_2,74.152 //
GP12brndp2_u:11448: rājā ghoṣastataścāpi varṣāṇi bhavitā trayaḥ // BndP_2,74.153 //
GP12brndp2_u:11449: sapta vai vajra mitraṃstu samā rājā tataḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11450: dvātriṃśadbhavitā vāpi samā bhāgavato nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,74.154 //
GP12brndp2_u:11453: śataṃ pūrmaṃ daśa dve ca tebhyaḥ kaṇvaṃ gamiṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11455: devabhūmiṃ tato hatvā śuṅgeṣu bhavitā nṛpaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11456: bhaviṣyati samā rājā pañca kaṇvāyanastu saḥ // BndP_2,74.157 //
GP12brndp2_u:11464: trayoviṃśatsamā rājā siṃdhuko bhavitā tvatha // BndP_2,74.161 //
GP12brndp2_u:11466: śrīśāntakarṇirbhavitā tasya putrastu vai mahān // BndP_2,74.162 //
GP12brndp2_u:11467: pañcāśattu samāḥ ṣaṭ ca śāntakarṇir bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11468: āpolavodvādaśa vai tasya putro bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.163 //
GP12brndp2_u:11471: tataḥ saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ hālo rājā bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11476: rājā ca gautamī putra ekaviṃśatsamā nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,74.167 //
GP12brndp2_u:11480: pulomāriḥ samāḥ sapta tataścaiṣāṃ bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.169 //
GP12brndp2_u:11481: ityete vai nṛpāstriṃśadandhrā bhokṣyanti vai mahīm /
GP12brndp2_u:11482: samāḥ śatāni catvāri pañcāśatṣaṭ tathaiva ca // BndP_2,74.170 //
GP12brndp2_u:11483: andhrāṇāṃ saṃsthitāḥ pañca teṣāṃ vaṃśyāśca ye punaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11484: saptaiva tu bhaviṣyanti daśābhīrāstato nṛpāḥ // BndP_2,74.171 //
GP12brndp2_u:11485: sapta gardabhinaścāpi tato 'tha daśa vai śakāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11488: andhrā bhokṣyanti vasudhāṃ śate dve ca śatañca vai // BndP_2,74.173 //
GP12brndp2_u:11491: śatāni trīṇyaśītiṃ ca bhokṣyanti vasudhāṃ śakāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11492: āśītī dve ca varṣāṇi bhoktāro yavanā mahīm // BndP_2,74.175 //
GP12brndp2_u:11496: śatāni trīṇi bhokṣyante maunā ekādaśaiva tu // BndP_2,74.177 //
GP12brndp2_u:11497: teṣu cchinneṣu kālena tataḥ kilakilo nṛpaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11499: samāḥ ṣaṇṇavatiṃ caiva pṛthivīṃ tu sameṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11502: bhogī bhaviṣyate rājā nṛpo nāgakulodvahaḥ // BndP_2,74.180 //
GP12brndp2_u:11504: dhanadharmā tataścāpi caturtho vaṃśajaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_2,74.181 //
GP12brndp2_u:11506: tasya bhrātā yavīyāṃstu nāmnā nandiyaśāḥ kila // BndP_2,74.182 //
GP12brndp2_u:11508: daihitraḥ śiśiko nāma pūrikāyāṃ nṛpo 'bhavat // BndP_2,74.183 //
GP12brndp2_u:11510: bhokṣyate ca samāḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ purīṃ kāñcanakāṃ ca vai // BndP_2,74.184 //
GP12brndp2_u:11512: tasya putrāstu catvāro bhaviṣyanti narādhipāḥ // BndP_2,74.185 //
GP12brndp2_u:11514: supratīko gabhīraśca samā bhokṣyati viṃśatim // BndP_2,74.186 //
GP12brndp2_u:11517: mekalāyāṃ nṛpāḥ sapta bhaviṣyanti ca saptatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11518: komalāyāṃ tu rājāno bhaviṣyanti mahābalāḥ // BndP_2,74.188 //
GP12brndp2_u:11519: meghā iti samākhyātā buddhimanto navaiva tu /
GP12brndp2_u:11529: nava nāgāstu bhokṣyati purīṃ caṃpāvatīṃ nṛpāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11530: mathurāṃ ca purā ramyāṃ nāgā bhokṣyanti sapta vai // BndP_2,74.194 //
GP12brndp2_u:11536: caṃpāṃ caiva purīṃ ramyāṃ bhokṣyante devarakṣitāḥ // BndP_2,74.197 //
GP12brndp2_u:11540: tulyakālaṃ bhaviṣyanti sarve hyate mahīkṣitaḥ // BndP_2,74.199 //
GP12brndp2_u:11546: vihīnāstu bhaviṣyanti dharmataḥ kāma tor'thataḥ // BndP_2,74.202 //
GP12brndp2_u:11548: viparyayeṇa vartante nāśāyiṣyanti vai prajāḥ // BndP_2,74.203 //
GP12brndp2_u:11550: teṣāṃ varttati paryāye bahustrīke yuge tadā // BndP_2,74.204 //
GP12brndp2_u:11552: tathā gatāsu vai kāṣṭhaṃ prajāsu jagatīśvarāḥ // BndP_2,74.205 //
GP12brndp2_u:11554: kalkinā vyāhatāḥ sarve mlecchā yāsyanti saṃkṣayam // BndP_2,74.206 //
GP12brndp2_u:11556: pranaṣṭe nṛpaśabde ca saṃdhyāśiṣṭe kalau yuge // BndP_2,74.207 //
GP12brndp2_u:11557: kiñcicchiṣṭāḥ prajāstā vai dharme naṣṭe parigrahāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11561: tyaktvā purāṇi grāmāṃśca bhaviṣyanti vanaukasaḥ // BndP_2,74.210 //
GP12brndp2_u:11563: naṣṭe snehe durāpannā bhraṣṭasnehāḥ suhṛjjanaḥ // BndP_2,74.211 //
GP12brndp2_u:11569: kṛtsnaṃ himavataḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ kūlaṃ ca lavaṇāṃbhasaḥ // BndP_2,74.214 //
GP12brndp2_u:11573: cīraṃ parṇaṃ ca vividhaṃ valkalānyajināni ca // BndP_2,74.216 //
GP12brndp2_u:11575: bījānnāni tathā nimneṣvī hantaḥ kāṣṭhaśaṅkubhiḥ // BndP_2,74.217 //
GP12brndp2_u:11589: sa saṃdhyāṃśe tu niḥśeṣe kṛtaṃ vai pratipatsyate // BndP_2,74.224 //
GP12brndp2_u:11591: ekarāśau bhaviṣyanti tadā kṛtayugaṃ bhavet // BndP_2,74.225 //
GP12brndp2_u:11592: eṣa vaṃśakramaḥ kṛtsnaḥ kīrtito vo yathākramam /
GP12brndp2_u:11596: pramāṇaṃ vai tathā vaktuṃ mahāpadmottaraṃ ca yat /
GP12brndp2_u:11597: antaraṃ ca śatānyaṣṭau ṣaṭtriṃśacca samāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_2,74.228 //
GP12brndp2_u:11601: saptaviṃśaiḥ śatairbhāvyā andhrāṇāṃ te 'nvayāḥ punaḥ // BndP_2,74.230 //
GP12brndp2_u:11605: māsā divyāḥ smṛtāḥ ṣaṭca divyābdāścaiva sapta hi // BndP_2,74.232 //
GP12brndp2_u:11606: tebhyaḥ pravartate kālo divyaḥ saptarṣibhistu taiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11607: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yau pūrvau dṛśyete uttarādiśi // BndP_2,74.233 //
GP12brndp2_u:11608: tayormadhye ca nakṣatraṃ dṛśyate yatsamaṃ divi /
GP12brndp2_u:11609: tena saptarṣayo yuktā jñeyā vyomni śataṃ samāḥ // BndP_2,74.234 //
GP12brndp2_u:11611: saptarṣayo hyathāyuktāḥ kāle parīkṣite śatam // BndP_2,74.235 //
GP12brndp2_u:11613: imāstadā tu prakṛtīrvyāpatsyante prajā bhṛśam // BndP_2,74.236 //
GP12brndp2_u:11615: śrautasmārtte praśithile dharme varṇāśrame tadā // BndP_2,74.237 //
GP12brndp2_u:11617: saṃsaktāśca bhaviṣyanti śūdrāḥ sārddhaṃ dvijātibhiḥ // BndP_2,74.238 //
GP12brndp2_u:11620: lavāllavaṃ bhraśyamānāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ krameṇa tu /
GP12brndp2_u:11622: yasminkṛṣṇo divyaṃ yātasta sminneva tadā dine /
GP12brndp2_u:11625: ṣaṣṭiṃ caiva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tūcyate kaliḥ // BndP_2,74.242 //
GP12brndp2_u:11626: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu tatsaṃdhyāṃśe hi kīrtite /
GP12brndp2_u:11627: niḥśeṣe ca tadā tasminkṛtaṃ vai pratipatsyate // BndP_2,74.243 //
GP12brndp2_u:11629: ikṣvākostu samṛtaṃ kṣattraṃ sumitrāntaṃ vivasvataḥ // BndP_2,74.244 //
GP12brndp2_u:11630: ailaṃ kṣattraṃ kṣemakāntaṃ soma vaṃśavido viduḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11631: ete vivasvataḥ putrāḥ kīrtitāḥ kīrttivarddhanāḥ // BndP_2,74.245 //
GP12brndp2_u:11633: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣattriyā vaiśyaḥ śūdrāścaivātra ye smṛtāḥ // BndP_2,74.246 //
GP12brndp2_u:11638: etasyāṃ tu yugākhyāyāṃ yataḥ kṣattraṃ prapatsyate /
GP12brndp2_u:11639: tathā hi kathayiṣyāmi gadato me nibodhata // BndP_2,74.249 //
GP12brndp2_u:11640: devāpiḥ pauravo rājā aikṣvākuścaiva yo maruḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11643: suvarcā nāma putrastu ikṣvākostu bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.251 //
GP12brndp2_u:11647: evaṃ sarvatra vijñeyaṃ saṃtānārthe tu latraṇam // BndP_2,74.253 //
GP12brndp2_u:11648: kṣīṇe kaliyuge tasminbhaviṣye ta kṛte yuge /
GP12brndp2_u:11649: saptarṣibhistu taiḥ sārddhamādye tretāyuge punaḥ // BndP_2,74.254 //
GP12brndp2_u:11651: dvāparāṃśena tiṣṭhanti kṣatriyā ṛṣibhiḥ saha // BndP_2,74.255 //
GP12brndp2_u:11652: bhaviṣye tu tataḥ sarge kāle kṛtayuge punaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11653: bījārthaṃ te bhaviṣyanti brahmakṣatrasya vai punaḥ // BndP_2,74.256 //
GP12brndp2_u:11655: saptarṣayo nṛpaiḥ sārddhaṃ saṃtānārthaṃ yugeyuge // BndP_2,74.257 //
GP12brndp2_u:11657: manvantarāṇāṃ saptānāṃ saṃtānaśca śrutaśca te // BndP_2,74.258 //
GP12brndp2_u:11659: yathā pravṛttisteṣāṃ vai pravṛttānāṃ tathā kṣayaḥ // BndP_2,74.259 //
GP12brndp2_u:11671: tāvadeva tu bhojānāṃ vistaro dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_2,74.265 //
GP12brndp2_u:11672: bhajate tryaṃśakaṃ kṣattraṃ caturthātta dyathā diśam /
GP12brndp2_u:11674: śataṃ vai prativindhyānāṃ śataṃ nāgāḥ sahaihayāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11676: śataṃ ca brahmadattānāṃ śāriṇāṃ viriṇāṃ śatam /
GP12brndp2_u:11677: tataḥ śataṃ tu paulānāṃ śvetakāśya kuśādayaḥ // BndP_2,74.268 //
GP12brndp2_u:11690: punaruktibahutvācca na śakya tu yugaiḥ saha /
GP12brndp2_u:11691: ete yayātiputrāṇāṃ pañca vaṃśā viśāṃ hitāḥ // BndP_2,74.275 //
GP12brndp2_u:11693: labhate ca varānpañca durlabhā niha laukikān // BndP_2,74.276 //
GP12brndp2_u:11696: ityeṣa vo mayā pādastṛtīyaḥ kathito dvijāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11697: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca kiṃ bhūyo varṇayāmyaham // BndP_2,74.278 //
GP12brndp2_u:11698: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde vaṃśānuvarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 74//
